faqs.question: Is JBS Noida hard to get?
faqs.answer: Getting admission in JBS Noida can be competitive. The institute accepts admisison based on merit and entrance exams. The institute accepts various national-level entrance exams such as CAT, MAT, CMAT, XAT, CUET, etc. Apart from the aforementioned entrance exams, Jaypee Business School also accepts the in-house entrance test conducted by Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, called JIIT UGET, for admission to the Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) programme.

faqs.question: Which is the top recruiting sector during Jaypee Business School BBA placements?
faqs.answer:
Jaypee Business School has released the sector-wise placements for its BBA batch passed out in 2024. As per the report, IT sector emerged as the top recruiting sector that placed 28%, followed by Education (24%) and Consulting (7%) during Jaypee Business School BBA placements 2024.
Earlier, Education sector has placed the most number of students, i.e. 36% during Jaypee Business School BBA placements 2023. The sector-wise placement distribution recorded during Jaypee Business School BBA placements 2023 is presented below:
Note: The “Others” category includes the sectors of Real Estate, Research, Automation, Business Services and E-Commerce.

college_info.intro: JBS Noida's popular programme is the MBA. The curriculum is designed to foster successful careers in the business world and nurture entrepreneurial spirit. JBS Noida offers a two-year, full-time MBA programme under the guidance of experts. The institute offers an MBA programme in Finance, Marketing, Informational Technology & Business Analytics, Human Resources, Fintech and Operation Management. The courses adopt a multi-dimensional pedagogy that has a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical nuances. Candidates can refer to the information below to learn more about the popular programmes at Jaypee Business School Noida:

placements.overview:
JBS Noida has a dedicated training and placement cell and is managed by a team of competent and dedicated executives, the team is well-connected with the industry and corporates and is increasing its network every year. The placement process commences with pre-placement training modules, guest lectures and workshops by industry experts.

As per the MBA placement report 2025 released, the highest package offered during Jaypee Business School MBA placements 2025 stood at INR 9.3 LPA. Roles of Business Development Associate, Brand Marketing, Management Trainee-Digital Marketing, Associate Functional Consultant- MS Dynamics and IP Admin Analyst were offered during JBS MBA placement 2025.

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, Jaypee Business School is good for placements. As per the JBS placement report 2025 released, companies such as Zycus, RNF Technologies, Junglee Games, Netsmartz and Clarivate visited the campus during MBA placements 2025. The highest package offered during Jaypee Business School MBA placements 2025 stood at INR 9.3 LPA.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for Jaypee Business School Noida MCom course?

faqs.answer: A:    Jaypee Business School Noida, does accepts CUET (UG) for admission to the BCom course. Candidates must qualify the exam and get shortlisted on the merit list prepared by the institute based on the CUET score. Common University Entrance Test also known as CUET UG is a national-level entrance exam conducted by NTA for admission to UG courses offered by participating institutes. Admission will be offered based on merit of CUET (UG) marks scored in GeneralTest + English + one of the other subjects. CUET UG 2025 city slip and CUET UG 2025 admit card will be issued tentatively in first week of May 2025. Registered candidates will be able to download the CUET city slip and admit card online by entering the CUET UG 2025 login.
faqs.question: Does Jaypee Business School Noida accept the CUET exam for BCom course?

faqs.answer: A:    Jaypee Business School Noida, Noida does accepts CUET (UG) for admission to the BBA course. Candidates must qualify the exam and get shortlisted on the merit list prepared by the institute based on the CUET score. Common University Entrance Test also known as CUET UG is a national-level entrance exam conducted by NTA for admission to UG courses offered by participating institutes. Admission will be offered based on merit of CUET (UG) marks scored in GeneralTest + English + one of the other subjects. CUET UG 2025 city slip and CUET UG 2025 admit card will be issued tentatively in first week of May 2025. Registered candidates will be able to download the CUET city slip and admit card online by entering the CUET UG 2025 login.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2026
reviews_list.review_title: A good college experience with supportive faculty and active placement.

review_content.Placements: The placement community of Jaypee Business School is very cooperative and supportive. They are putting in continuous efforts to bring in repeat companies to the college for the placement. Companies like Swiggy and HDFC Bank have visited for the placement and students are actively taking part in it.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is well maintained and student-friendly. The campus provides well-equipped classrooms and labs for different activities. Hostel facilities are amazing with a good quality of food and even provide good canteen facilities for both students and hostlers.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2026
reviews_list.review_title: Supportive faculty, industry-relevant MBA curriculum, and well-rounded college experience.

review_content.Placements: As of now, 75 percent of students are placed. The average package is 5.5 LPA, the median is 8 LPA, and the highest is 16 LPA. MedtechAI, FORVIS Mazar, Travclan, and many others are recruiting companies. BD, MT, and Operation Analyst are the job roles offered. Internships are provided in Mercedes-Benz (T&T) and Max Healthcare.
review_content.Infrastructure: Labs, classrooms, a digital library, and many others are available. Hostel, Canteen, medical facilities, as well as sports, are well maintained with a quality benchmark. As in food facilities, we have only vegetarian options on the menu, and in the non-vegetarian section, we have only egg-based products.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2026
reviews_list.review_title: Jaypee Business School review.

review_content.Placements: Placements are good. The placement cell ensures that almost every student gets placed by the completion of the course. Companies come with roles like analyst, business development executive, digital marketing, financial analyst, and more. Overall, the placement is satisfactory.
review_content.Infrastructure: The campus is well-equipped with every facility. Classes are huge with enough seating for 80-100 students. Washrooms are clean and hygienic. They have computer labs, a learning resource center with thousands of books available in every domain, a basketball court, and a huge auditorium.

reviews_list.batch_info: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) - Batch of 2026
reviews_list.review_title: Good infrastructure and good standard students.

review_content.Placements: In BBA, there is no such criterion. Jaypee conducts its exam that you have to clear, or you can also take admission based on your 12th marks. In BBA, the average package is 5 lakhs per year, and the highest is 15 LPA. Top recruiting companies are HCL, IBM, etc. We are being trained on how to get internships.
review_content.Infrastructure: Overall, the infrastructure is good. Classrooms and labs are fully air-conditioned and have Wi-Fi. Hostel facilities are average; it's very expensive, but the hostel food is good. Jaypee does not focus on sports that much. They only focus on academics, not on sports.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2025
reviews_list.review_title: Choosing jaypee business school for my MBA has been my wise decision.

review_content.Placements: The college's placement record was exceptional, with senior students landing jobs in renowned companies like Wipro and Infosys. Salaries ranged from 5.5 Lacs to 18 lakhs, and over 85% of students from the last batch secured placements.
review_content.Infrastructure: Jaypee's infrastructure is unparalleled, offering exceptional quality food and a comfortable living experience in the hostel. The campus boasts state-of-the-art facilities, including expansive classrooms, well-equipped laboratories, and a fully stocked library that caters to academic needs.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2026
reviews_list.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the faculty, really good infrastructure, and facilities available.

review_content.Placements: About 25% placed in my batch. Roles offered are financial analyst, business development, business analyst, and HR roles. Top recruiting companies are Naukri, Forvis Mazars, Mecliar, ZS Associates, Jaro Education, PPAP Automotives, SkyLeckar, Celiar, and Protivity Ltd.
review_content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure like the library has Wi-Fi that works very well. Facilities like ACs and projectors in all classrooms work very well. Labs have all the computers working well. The quality of facilities in the hostel includes 24/7 Wi-Fi availability, a gym, a pool, grocery shops, and the food in the canteen is also good.

faqs.answer: Getting admission in JBS Noida can be competitive. The institute accepts admisison based on merit and entrance exams. The institute accepts various national-level entrance exams such as CAT, MAT, CMAT, XAT, CUET, etc. Apart from the aforementioned entrance exams, Jaypee Business School also accepts the in-house entrance test conducted by Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, called JIIT UGET, for admission to the Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) programme.
faqs.question: Q: Is JBS Noida hard to get?

faqs.answer: Jaypee Business School Noida MBA admission is based on entrance exams. The institute accepts national entrance exams such as CAT, MAT, CMAT, XAT, CUET, and others. Candidates must have to qualify Class 12 from the recognised board with 50% marks. It is mandatory for students to meet the eligibility criteria and qualify one of the national entrance exams for the admission.
faqs.question: Q: How can I get admission to the JBS Noida MBA course?

faqs.answer: Jaypee Business School is one of the top Business Schools in India. The school trains students to successfully manage, lead, organise and adapt to the changing business scenario. JBS Noida offers MBA and BBA programmes. The programmes equip the students with practical skills as well as theoretical knowledge. Students from all streams, including Science, Commerce, Humanities etc., are eligible for admission. JBS equips its students with an innovative mindset and the necessary skills and knowledge to make informed decisions.
faqs.question: Q: What is unique about Jaypee Business School?

faqs.answer: Acoording to the students reviews, JBS Noida can be a good choice for an average students. If the students are loking for decent business school with a reasonable placement record, but if aiming for top-tier jobs, they should consider more prestigious B-schools with higher cut-offs; the college offers good faculty, infrastructure, and industry exposure.

admission_overview.college_name: JBS Noida Admission 2026: Fees, Eligibility, Dates & Application Process

admission_overview.title: Jaypee Business School Admission Overview 2026
admission_overview.description: Jaypee Business School admission 2026 is entrance-based. The Jaypee Business School offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral-level courses in the field of Management. The admission criteria for all JBS Noida courses is entrance-based. The institute accepts various national-level entrance exams such as CAT, MAT, CMAT, XAT, CUET, etc. Apart from the aforementioned entrance exams, Jaypee Business School also accepts the in-house entrance test conducted by Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, called JIIT UGET, for admission to the Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) programme. Continue reading to learn more about Jaypee Business School admission.

eligibility_selection.title: Jaypee Business School Eligibility & Selection 2026
eligibility_selection.description: Jaypee Business School course admissions are offered to a total of three courses in the field of Business and Management. Candidates seeking admission to Jaypee Business School must meet the course-specific eligibility criteria before applying to their desired course and go through the selection process determined by the Institute. The table below shows the eligibility and selection process for various Jaypee Business School courses: Courses

courses_table.eligibility: Class 12 or equivalent from a recognised board with 60% aggregate
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent from a recognised University with 50% aggregate.
courses_table.selection_criteria: CAT/ MAT/ CMAT/ XAT/ GMAT/ ATMA/ CUET-PG + Group Discussion/ Personal Interview

courses_table.eligibility: Master's Degree or PhD in Sciences/ Humanities/ Social Sciences/ Management/ Pharmacy with a minimum 60% aggregate marks or equivalent CGPA.
courses_table.selection_criteria: NET / SLET / UGC / CSIR (JRF) or PhD entrance test conducted by JIIT

faqs.answer: Yes, candidates are provided direct admission to the BCom course at Jaypee Business School. For direct admission, candidates are required to have valid qualifications, i.e., Class 12 with 75% marks or equivalent, in aggregate in three subjects, i.e. Mathematics, Physics, and English. For direct admission, candidates are not required to appear for the accepted entrance exams such as JIIT UGE or CUET (UG).
faqs.question: Can I get direct admission for BCom course at Jaypee Business School?

faqs.answer: The application fee for BCom at Jaypee Business School Noida is around INR 500. Candidates must fill out the application form to apply for the BCom course at JBS. Candidates can download the application form from the official website and pay the application fee while submitting the form. While filling the application form for Jaypee Universities, candidates are advised to enter the same email id and mobile no. as mentioned in their CUET exam application form.
faqs.question: What is the application fee for BCom at Jaypee Business School Noida?

faqs.answer: The last date to apply for the BBA course at Jaypee Business School Noida is in May as per the last year schedule. Candidates with a valid qualification. Merit List of qualified candidates will be prepared, and selected candidates will be offered admission. Further, candidates appearing in the Class 12 examination must upload their results the latest by the closing of applications.
faqs.question: What is the last date to apply for BBA course at Jaypee Business School Noida?

paragraphs: Jaypee Business School admission to all three courses is entrance-based. Candidates seeking admission to JBS Noida have to appear for the national-level entrance exams accepted by the institute before applying to their desired course. The JBS admission process begins with the release of application forms on the official website and ends with the acceptance of the admission offer by the candidate. The step-wise Jaypee Business School admission process is mentioned below:
Step 1: JBS Application Process

Candidates need to apply for their desired course through the JBS official website.The JBS application form is made available online at (bs.ac.in), http://www.jiit.ac.in and http://www.getadmissions.com/jaypee. To apply offline, candidates need to visit the Admission Help Desk / Registrar’s Office at JIIT, A-10, Sector-62, Noida,Uttar Pradeshand purchase the JBS application form from there. Candidates are advised to check the eligibility criteria before applying:
Step 2: JBS Selection Process

Admission to JBS courses is entrance-based and the institute conducts multiple selection rounds to shortlist candidates for final admission to the MBA course. In the first round candidates need to appear for the relevant entrance exam, as per their selected course. Further, shortlisted candidates are called for the GDPI round.
The candidates who perform well in all selection rounds are given the final admission offer.
Step 3: JBS Final Admission

The selected candidates are required to pay a partial academic fee for semester 1 as mentioned in the Admission Offer Letter to secure their seat. The balance amount will be payable at the time of registration.

The final admission offers are given to those who perform well in all the rounds of selection. More highlights about the JBS MBA course are given below:

faqs.question: What is the MBA eligibility criteria at JBS Noida?
faqs.answer: Jaypee Business School Noida offers a two-year MBA programme in total eight major as well as minor specialisations. Admission in the course is based on the qualifying entrance exam scores. The final selection is based on the candidates’ entrance exam score, language proficiency and performance in the GD & PI round. The table below presents the MBA specialisations, eligibility criteria and accepted exams:CourseEligibility CriteriaSelection CriteriaMBA-Bachelor's degree or its equivalent in any di

faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA at JBS Noida?
faqs.answer: The fee for MBA programme at JBS Noida is inclusive of multiple variables. The common fee components are Tuition Fees, Development Fees, Study Material, etc. for both the years. The total fees of the programme is INR 13.56 lakh. Find below the fee break up for JBS Noida courses:Fee Components1 year2 yearsAdmission ChargesINR 25,000-Tuition FeeINR 5.37 lakhINR 5.64 lakhDevelopment FeeINR 88,000INR 92,000Caution MoneyINR 20,000-Study MaterialINR 15,000INR 15,000TotalINR 6.85 lakhINR 6.71 lakh

faqs.question: What are the MBA specialisations offered at JBS Noida?
faqs.answer: At JBS Noida, candidates can pursue MBA programme across multiple specialisations. These specialisations are divided among major and minor specialisations. Candidates can pursue the following programmes at Jaypee Business School:Information Technology & BusinessAnalyticsOperations ManagementMarketing Management Digital MarketingFinancial Management Financial ServiceHuman Resource Management International BusinessHospital and Healthcare Administration Education ManagementFintech

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to MBA course at Jaypee Business School?
faqs.answer: In case ofMBA, the admission criteria of JBS Noida is completely entrance-based. The institute accepts various national-level entrance exams such asCAT, MAT, CMAT, XAT, CUET,etc.. Apart from the aforementioned entrance exams, Jaypee Business School also accepts the in-house entrance test conducted by Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, calledJIIT UGET, for admission to the BBA course. Therefore, candidates cannot get direct admissio to MBA course at Jaypee Business School.

courses_data.name: Jaypee Business School BBA Admission 2026
courses_data.description: Jaypee Business School BBA admissions are allotted based on the performance of the candidate in CUET-UG or JIIT UGET. Candidates who have passed their class 12 from a recognised board with a minimum of 60% aggregate can apply to the BBA course. JBS Noida gives direct admission to candidates with minimum 75% marks or equivalent in English and any 2 from the list (Accountancy, Business Studies, Computer Science /Informatics Practices, Economics, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology/ Applied Mathematics, Psychology, Geography, Political Science, Sociology, Entrepreneurship, Legal Studies) and minimum pass in all subject in Class 12 examination. More highlights about Jaypee Business School Noida are given below:

faqs.question: What is the minimum qualification required for admission to BBA at JBS Noida?
faqs.answer: JBS Noida offers a three-year full-time BBA course, that aims to provide students a general education curriculum through which they can learn in multiple disciplines. After successful completion of BBA course, students can opt for a range of jobs from sectors like finance, marketing, sales, management, government, health and education. The eligibility criteria and specialisation offered under JBS BBA course are tabulated below:CourseEligibility CriteriaSelection CriteriaBBAClass 12 or equivalent

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to BBA course at Jaypee Business School?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates are provided direct admission to theBBA course at Jaypee Business School, Noida. For direct admission, candidates are required to have valid qualifications, i.e., Class 12 with 75% aggregate or equivalent. Candidates willl be offered admisson based on Merit List of qualified candidates will be prepared and selected candidates will be offered admission. Candidates appearing in Class 12 examination must upload their results on the official website.

faqs.question: Does Jaypee Business School Noida accept the CUET exam for BBA course?
faqs.answer: Jaypee Business School Noida, Noida does accepts CUET (UG) for admission to the BBA course. Candidates must qualify the exam and get shortlisted on the merit list prepared by the institute based on the CUET score.Common University Entrance Testalso known asCUET UGis a national-level entrance exam conducted by NTA for admission to UG courses offered by participating institutes. Admission will be offered based on merit of CUET (UG) marks scored in GeneralTest + English + one of the other subjects.

faqs.question: Does JBS Noida take direct admission?
faqs.answer: Yes, JBS Noida gives direct admission, in the BBA programme, to candidates with minimum 75% marks or equivalent in English and any 2 from the list (Accountancy, Business Studies, Computer Science /Informatics Practices, Economics, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology/ Applied Mathematics, Psychology, Geography, Political Science, Sociology, Entrepreneurship, Legal Studies) and minimum pass in all subject in 10+2 examination.In case ofMBA, the admission criteria of JBS Noida is completely entrance-based. The institute accepts various national-level entrance exams such asCAT, MAT, CMAT, XAT, CUET,etc.. Apart from the aforementioned entrance exams, Jaypee Business School also accepts the in-house entrance test conducted by Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, calledJIIT UGET, for admission to the BBA course.

faqs.question: When is Jaypee Business School application forms out?
faqs.answer: For admission to the MBA Batch, the GDPI session is usually held in March.The CAT score has been releasedATMA registration is ongoing, the last date to apply is usually in Feb, and the exam is usually conducted in Feb.MAT registration is ongoingOne is advised to visit the Shiksha website for the information on latest updates.

faqs.question: Can I get admission in Jaypee Business School without CAT?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates can get admission in Jaypee Business School without CAT exam. As per the school admission guidelines, admission to the MBA course is based on various national-level entrance exams. Candidates must also check the eligibility criteria before applying for the courses offered at Jaypee Business School. The basic eligibility criteria is that the candidate must have a bachelor's degree or its equivalent in any discipline from a statutory university with at least 50% aggregate marks or equivalent CGPA. Few of the accepted entrance exams are as follows:MAT or Management Aptitude Test or MATXAT or Xavier Aptitude TestCMAT or Common Management Admission TestCUET PG or Common University Entrance Test (Postgraduate)

reviews.review_heading: A good college experience with supportive faculty and active placement.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is well maintained and student-friendly. The campus provides well-equipped classrooms and labs for different activities. Hostel facilities are amazing with a good quality of food and even provide good canteen facilities for both students and hostlers.

reviews.review_heading: Supportive faculty, industry-relevant MBA curriculum, and well-rounded college experience.
reviews.review_text: Labs, classrooms, a digital library, and many others are available. Hostel, Canteen, medical facilities, as well as sports, are well maintained with a quality benchmark. As in food facilities, we have only vegetarian options on the menu, and in the non-vegetarian section, we have only egg-based products.

reviews.review_heading: Jaypee Business School review.
reviews.review_text: The campus is well-equipped with every facility. Classes are huge with enough seating for 80-100 students. Washrooms are clean and hygienic. They have computer labs, a learning resource center with thousands of books available in every domain, a basketball court, and a huge auditorium.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure and good standard students.
reviews.review_text: Overall, the infrastructure is good. Classrooms and labs are fully air-conditioned and have Wi-Fi. Hostel facilities are average; it's very expensive, but the hostel food is good. Jaypee does not focus on sports that much. They only focus on academics, not on sports.

reviews.review_heading: Choosing jaypee business school for my MBA has been my wise decision.
reviews.review_text: Jaypee's infrastructure is unparalleled, offering exceptional quality food and a comfortable living experience in the hostel. The campus boasts state-of-the-art facilities, including expansive classrooms, well-equipped laboratories, and a fully stocked library that caters to academic needs.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the faculty, really good infrastructure, and facilities available.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure like the library has Wi-Fi that works very well. Facilities like ACs and projectors in all classrooms work very well. Labs have all the computers working well. The quality of facilities in the hostel includes 24/7 Wi-Fi availability, a gym, a pool, grocery shops, and the food in the canteen is also good.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Jaypee Business Schools MBA programme.
reviews.review_text: Our college has the best infrastructure, which includes labs, classrooms, library, Wi-Fi facility, 24/7 security, badminton court, basketball court, dispensary, hostels, AC classrooms, etc. Being a hosteller, I can tell that we are provided with the best quality food in the mess as well as the canteen.

reviews.review_heading: Best college for MBA in Noida and Delhi NCR.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure here is really amazing. We have everything we need like AC classrooms, Wi-Fi, 24/7 security, library, hygienic hostels and cafeteria, etc. We have a dispensary in our college for medical facilities, multiple sports options, and an A-Z store from where we can buy our daily essentials without stepping out of college.

reviews.review_heading: Why you should choose Jaypee Business School for MBA.
reviews.review_text: The college has all the facilities which are required including Wi-Fi, classrooms, library, etc. The classrooms are well-equipped with several teaching tools. There are no issues relating to infrastructure, the security is tight with access being in the concerned authorities hands in times of need.

reviews.review_heading: Amazing life at Jaypee Business School!
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure at Jaypee Business School is really pretty. There are many things for students like, cafeteria, a comprehensive library, AC classrooms, labs and the hostels. Hostels have good quality food,  24/7 security, Wi-Fi, a store inside the campus for students to buy anything they want, sprint shops, etc.

reviews.review_heading: MBA life in Jaypee Business School.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure Jaypee Business School provide us with is clean, somewhat beautiful as compared to other colleges. They provide a high quality infrastructure to us and maintain it. The hostels here are air conditioned and well maintained. The food they provide in the mess is tasty and healthy.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Jaypee Business School.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is good. Our college provides above-average facilities. We have an excellent lecture theatre with comfortable seats. Labs are good, but the software is outdated. The library is good. The library has a discussion room. The hostel is not worth the money paid. The food served in the hostel is good, healthy, and hygienic.

reviews.review_heading: Best college for BBA out of other near options.
reviews.review_text: All the facilities in campus are really great. It is a modern environment with every lab, lecture halls, elevators, projectors, huge parking, grounds for sports, great number of hostel rooms. Facilites in the hostel are also very good although the fees is a bit high around 1 Lacs each semester.

reviews.review_heading: Good placement in 2018-19. Faculty is good. Not many fests are conducted but good infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The hostel is amazing. They have dual room sharing system and ACs is in every room. The mess food is delicious. The make two side dishes, dal, rice and chapati. The Wi-Fi speed is good. The labs, classrooms and library are well air conditioned. The classrooms have projectors and we study mostly using the projectors.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with our college and would recommend others also.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is very good. Facilities available on the campus are Wi-Fi, 3 to 4 hi-tech computer labs, good classrooms and a world-class library. I am not a hosteller, but I know many hostellers. According to their experience, the hostel is good, but the mess food is below average. The canteen is good as compared to the mess.

admission_overview.college_name: Goel Group of Institutions Admission 2025: Fees, Courses, Eligibility and Selection

admission_process.title: Goel Group of Institutions Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Goel Group of Institutions admissionto all courses is entrance-based. The college offers various courses at undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma levels.Goel Group of Institutionsoffers admission to courses in the field of Pharmacy, Engineering, Commerce and others. Admission to these courses is subject to the performance of the candidate in the entrance exam accepted by the college. Interested candidates must begin their admission process by meeting the course-specific eligibility criteria followed by filling out the application form before the deadline. All the information related to theGoel Group of Institutionsadmission process 2025,along with course eligibility and selection criteria, is available in the below article:

Currently, admissions are open at Goel Group of Institutions. Candidates must check out the application deadline to avoid missing out on any event. Find belowGoel Group of Institutionsadmission highlights:
Particulars
Goel Group of InstitutionsAdmission Highlights 2025
Mode of study
Full-time/ Offline
Programmes Offered
Admission status 2025
How to apply?
Online at gitm.goel.edu.in
Level of programmes offered
UG, PG, PhD
Popular programmes
BTech| MTech| MBA

Goel Group of Institutions course admission is entrance-based. Candidates need to pass Class 12 to apply for UG programmes. A graduation is the minimum requirement to apply for PG courses. Further, students are also required to provide valid entrance test scores for admission. The college accepts various entrance exam scores, such as JEE MAINS, CUET, CUET(PG), JEECUP, Lucknow University Centralized Exam and NEET. Find below the top Goel Group of Institutions courses along with their eligibility and selection criteria:
Common Eligibility
Selection Criteria
JEE Mains/CUET UG  + UPSEE Counselling
CUET PG/GATE + Counselling
CUET UG+ UPSEE Counselling
Check here for detailed eligibility criteria for moreGoel Group of Institutions courses
Goel Group of Institutions admission processincludes registration, selection and admission confirmation. Candidates must follow the below steps to get a seat at Goel Group of Institutions:
STEP 1: Goel Group of Institutions Application Process
Candidates are required to apply online on the official website of the college. Candidates need to pay an application fee of INR 1,000 to register for a course at the college:
STEP 2: Selection Rounds

The college shortlists candidates for all its programmes based on scores of various entrance exams, such as JEE Mains, CUET, NEET, JEECUP and others. To be eligible for admission, candidates are required to appear in an entrance exam accepted by the college. Further, candidates are also required to appear in respective counselling for final seat allotment.
STEP 3: Merit List andAdmission Confirmation

Once the selection rounds are over, the college releases a merit list. Selected aspirants are allotted seats in the college. Candidates need to pay the Goel Group of Institutions fee to confirm their seat at the college.

faqs.answer: Candidates need to complete Class 10 and Class 12 with 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for reserved category) to apply for  Goel Group of Institutions BTech programme. Admission to BTech is based on entrance exam scores, such as JEE Main, CUET, followed by UPSEE counselling and eligibility criteria set by the college. Once the candidates are selected, they need to come for document verification and fee payment.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MBA at Goel Group of Institutions?
faqs.answer: Aspirants must pass a minimum of three-year graduation with at least 50% aggregate can apply for the Goel Group of Institutions MBA programme. Candidates must hold documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission. MBA is a two-year programme offered at Goel Group of Institutions.

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for MBA course at Goel Group of Institutions?

After completion of the selection rounds, shortlisted aspirants need to pay the course fee and submit the specified documents to confirm their admission.

faqs.question: What is the admission process for Goel Group of Institutions?
faqs.answer: Candidates are first required to apply for the preferred programme in online mode. Goel Group of Institutions shortlists candidates for all its programmes based on entrance exam scores. The university accepts JEE Main, CUET, CMAT, CAT, MAT, GATE and other scores for admission to its UG, PG and PhD programmes. Besides, the university also offers direct to the candidates belonging to the management category.  Once selection rounds are completed, candidates are required to submit the specified documents and pay the course fee to confirm their seats.

faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for admission at Goel Group of Institutions?
faqs.answer: Yes,  the Goel Group of Institutions considers entrance exam scores for admission to UG, PG and PhD courses. The university accepts various entrance exam scores, such as JEE Mains, CMAT, CAT, MAT, CUET and others, followed by counselling for admission to specific programmes. However, the college also offers direct admission via management quota. To be eligible for admission to the management quota seat, candidates must complete the basic eligibility criteria. After filling out the criteria, candidates are required to visit the college's official website to apply for admission.

faqs.question: Are admissions open at Goel Group of Institutions?
faqs.answer: Yes,  Goel Group of Institutions admissions are currently open for all the courses. Candidates can apply online by visiting college official website. The university accepts various entrance exam scores to select candidates for admission. Besides, the university also offers some seats via management quota.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for admission to Goel Group of Institutions?

placement_data.title: Goel Group of Institutions Placement Overview 2024
paragraphs: Goel Group of Institutions has a Training and Placement (T&P) Cell that helps in shaping the careers of students from their induction and orientation, summer internships, mid-term projects, right to their final placements and even beyond. The final placements at Goel Group of Institutions are a result of very systematic interaction with the industry and continuous career counselling of the students.

The 2024 placement session concluded with 83% of students placed . A total of 500 job offers were distributed among the 390 students placed . The highest package and average package during Goel Group of Institutions placements 2024 stood at INR 15 LPA and INR 5 LPA , respectively. Additionally, 100 summer internship offers were provided to the students during the 2024 placement drive. The top recruiters of Goel Group of Institutions placements include Axis Bank, TATA Steel, Capgemini, Siemens, Accenture, Piramal Group, Walmart, Google, Tech Mahindra, Amazon, etc.

faqs.question: How are placements for B.Tech in CSE at Goel Group of Institutions?
faqs.answer: The placement outcomes for the B.Tech programme in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at Goel Group of Institutions have been encouraging. In 2023, the placement percentage stood at 70.8%, showcasing a favorable trend. The highest package offered to students reached INR 10 LPA (Lakhs Per Annum), while the lowest recorded package was INR 2.4 LPA (Lakhs Per Annum). Notable recruiters participating in the placement drive included prominent companies like Jaro Education, Axis Bank, Paytm, Justdial, and Siemens, among others. This data reflects the institution's commitment to facilitating promising career opportunities for its CSE graduates.

reviews.review_heading: My college placement section must be improved for students.
reviews.review_text: As a student of the Goel Institute, Lucknow, I would like to suggest that the facilities and infrastructure available in my course, B.Com (Hons), are very good, like Wi-Fi, classrooms, library, etc. The quality of the facilities in my hostel, like the mess food, is edible and scheduled.

reviews.review_heading: My college placement section must be improved.
reviews.review_text: As a student of Shri Ram College of Commerce, I would like to suggest that the facilities and infrastructure available in my course, B.Com (Hons), are very good, like Wi-Fi, classrooms, library, etc. The quality of the facilities in my hostel, like the mess food, is edible and scheduled.

reviews.review_heading: The infrastructure was good. I had a decent college experience.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure at Goel Institute of Technology and Management is good and suitable for technology education. Classrooms are spacious and well-maintained with proper seating and ventilation. The hostel facilities are decent with clean rooms and basic amenities.

reviews.review_heading: It is good for studies with well-qualified faculty members, good labs, and facilities.
reviews.review_text: Facilities such as a library, computer labs, AI/ML labs, biotech labs, other department labs, AC classrooms (only for 1st year B.Tech), Wi-Fi connection, and canteen are available. Hostel facilities are good but the mess food is not good. It has an Ayurved Hospital. Our college also has a Goel Incubation Centre for start-ups.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure and decent placements with supportive faculty members.
reviews.review_text: IT department has well-equipped labs, high-speed Wi-Fi, smart classrooms, and a digital library. Hostels are decent with 24X7 water, electricity, and security. Mess food is average but hygienic. Medical aid is available, and sports facilities are good.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the faculty and staff. The infrastructure is better.
reviews.review_text: The hostels are well-equipped and offer good food in the hostel mess, ensuring better security and safety for students. The cafeteria serves quality meals. The Department of Biotechnology provides excellent vocational education.

reviews.review_heading: Review of my college.
reviews.review_text: Outer infrastructure is good no complaints, building and campus are so clean and green also, with lots of trees and parking space are available. Every department has different buildings, like pharmaceutical department and separate building for GIPS. Courses offered by LU come under GIHSM and GIHS. Ayurvedic department has its other building and engineering and courses offered by AKTU have their separate building. College also has its hospital on campus. Classrooms of our department feel suffocat...

reviews.review_heading: My college gave 100% placement to all children and also good placements in 2015.
reviews.review_text: My campus has Wi-Fi, computer labs, a canteen, a bank branch, and a large ground with ample parking. The facilities in the hostel are of good quality. The mess and canteen offer the best quality of food available. There is a hospital on campus, and the sports ground is quite large.

reviews.review_heading: I love my college. Faculty members are good and polite. Students get good placements every year.
reviews.review_text: We have the best Wi-Fi and a library system. All computers are active and look clean. We have a green campus, which takes me to the way of freshness. There is a big ground for playing students. Many events are held in this playground. Many students take place to perform in these events.

reviews.review_heading: Faculty members of the department are the best but HOD is too rude.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is not available for students in college but available in hostel. Teachers check regularly the attendance of hostel students. Food quality is not so good in the hostel as well as the canteen. Sports are arranged seasonally.

reviews.review_heading: College life is very good.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure and facilities are at top level. The infrastructure of my college is like a foreign college. My college is placed at very peaceful location. The facilities given in my college are very good like Wi-Fi, computer labs, library, classrooms, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Goel Group of Institutions.
reviews.review_text: The college hostels are something that I would not prefer to join in because there are some very strict rules for the hostel like you cannot leave or enter the hostel after 8 PM. The college hostel does not consist of any gyms, swimming pools, or any other co-curricular activities. The infrastructure of the hostel is good and well-maintained. Security is a major concern for many students. The security provided is very good.

reviews.review_heading: College is given average placement but good facility.
reviews.review_text: The college has advanced laboratories, a smart lab, and a library. The Mechanical Workshop is a common lab for second-year mechanical engineering students and is equipped with state-of-the-art machines. Hostel facilities: GITM has both boys' and girls' hostels. The girls' hostel has a DG set for electricity backup, a geyser for hot water, and Wi-Fi. Other amenities: The college has a canteen, stadium, and temple on campus. It also has a tie-up with nationalized banks, allowing students to open a...

reviews.review_heading: The faculty is professional and well-educated.
reviews.review_text: Goel Group of Institutions has all the necessary infrastructure, including libraries, a clean campus, and good indoor and outdoor playgrounds.

reviews.review_heading: Optimum college for the B. Pharm course.
reviews.review_text: The college has good labs and affordable fees as compared to others. For the B Pharma course, it's excellent to choose this college. The library is also good, and great reference books related to B Pharma, like Ross and Wilson's Anatomy and Physiology, etc., are available. The hostel is below average, and the expensive mess is also the worst, so choose wisely.

highlights.summary:
Pearl Academy 2026 Admissions Open

Pearl Academy New Friends Colony admissions 2025-26 are currently open for various courses. Students can visit the official website of the institute to learn more and apply online.

table.details: - 1st Outlook I-CARE Ranking (top 25 Fashion Design institute) - 9th India Today (top Fashion Design colleges in India)

college_info.intro:
Pearl Academy New Friends Colony flagship courses are Bachelor of Design (BDes) and Master of Design (MDes). BDes courses are offered in textile design, fashion styling, fashion communication, communication design, etc. While MDes courses are offered across various specialisations. The application mode for both programmes is online. Other popular Pearl Acsademy New Friends Colony courses include MBA, BBA, and Certificate programmes.
Given below are the popular programmes of Pearl Academy, New Friends Colony along with their eligibility & selection criteria:

placements.overview:
Pearl Academy New Friends Colony admissions 2025-26 are currently open for various courses. Students can visit the official website of the institute to learn more and apply online.

Pearl Academy is a premier Fashion Design institute in India, ranked 1st in Outlook's I-Care rankings 2023 and 9th in India Today's list of Top Fashion Design Colleges. Established in 1993, Pearl Academy offers over 40 courses across five regions, including Delhi-South and Delhi-West; Jaipur and Mumbai; and Bengaluru, through its campuses.

Pearl Academy New Friends Colony offers UG, PG, and certificate programmes in the field of Design, Media, Fashion. Admission to the institute courses is based on Pearl Academy's entrance exams and Design Aptitude Test (DAT). The campus of Pearl Academy provides students and staff with a library, a hostel, and a canteen.

faqs.answer: A:    The Pearl Academy conducts entrance exams for admissions. The admission process is purely entrance-based. These exams such as Pearl Academy Entrance Exam (PAF). PAF Entrance Exam consists of GPT (General Proficiency Test) and that (Design Aptitude Test). Candidates who want this Pearl Academy admission to UG Diploma or PG Diploma courses have to clear the test.
faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for Pearl Academy?

faqs.answer: A:    Pearl Academy New Friends Colony offers various UG, PG and Certificate courses. The eligibility criteira for each level of courses are as follows:Course NameEligibilityUGPass Class 12 in respective streamPGGraduation in any stream from a recognised universityCertificateClass 10 from a recognised boardAge should be at least 17 years
faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria to apply for various courses at Pearl Academy New Friends Colony?

faqs.answer: A:    Pearl Academy in New Friends Colony, Delhi accepts scores from the UCEED exam for all design courses. Pearl Academy's entrance exam, the Pearl Academy Entrance Exam (PAF), consists of the General Proficiency Test (GPT) and the Design Aptitude Test (DAT). The selection process also includes a personal interview and portfolio presentation. Pearl Academy's MBA programme has a two-year duration and specializations in fashion and lifestyle business management, and global luxury brand management. The selection criteria for the MBA programme is merit in the GPT and a personal interview.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Des in Fashion Design - Batch of 2019
reviews_list.review_title: The college has good faculty, infrastructure is good but the campus area is very small.

review_content.Placements: The college guarantees 100% placement to all the students. The college has average packaged companies or designers for recruitment. The students get placed to work under known designers and gain experience. The roles offered in the courses are of as a designer, social media influencer and so.
review_content.Infrastructure: The college has a very modernised infrastructure with fully equipped security facility to centralised air-conditioning and lift facility. The college does not have its own hostel but the canteen food and medical facilities are present. The college is a fashion and technology college, so has less opportunity for sports and games.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Des in Fashion Design - Batch of 2018
reviews_list.review_title: Overall performance of our college.

review_content.Placements: According to the college, there was 97 percent placement but we don't if that is the exact percentage. Seniors said that some Pearl pass out designers also come to take the interview. They don't provide salary as per expectation. Seniors are not happy with their placement. They want good placement.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. Completely air conditioned. All the classrooms and labs are maintained. Earlier, the food of the canteen was not of a good quality but now they have a variety and good quality food. Stationary is also good, sells goods at a reasonable price. Stairs need to be maintained and lift too. Should have cross ventilation. We have a think tank where we work.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Des in Fashion Design - Batch of 2019
reviews_list.review_title: Our college is amazing to be in.

review_content.Placements: Our college provides ensured placements to our course students in good companies or under great artists and designers. Our college provides 85% of placements for students. The salary package offered ranges from 3-8 LPA for the students initially depending on their skills and achievements.
review_content.Infrastructure: Our college has huge classrooms and labs all over with high-speed Wi-Fi connectivity. The college building is fully air-conditioned. Our college has a maximum of its walls portrait with graphites. Our college has various rooms for all kinds of different activities related to the course like stitching room, photoshoot, stationery room, etc.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Des in Fashion Design - Batch of 2019
reviews_list.review_title: Our college is extremely good, but it is a bit high on the fee.

review_content.Placements: The college provides 90% secured placement to all the students of FD course. The minimum salary package offered by the college was 3 LPA. All the top design houses and companies are in the placement chains like Manish Arora, Tarun Tahiliani, etc. Almost all the students got placements under top designers apart from the students that persuaded higher studies and owned startups. It was a great experience being part of Pearl Academy. Since we persuaded fashion designing, maximum students opted for pattern making and designing, whereas few students opted for merchandising as well.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Des in Fashion Design - Batch of 2022
reviews_list.review_title: Our college is the biggest hub for fashion and design.

review_content.Placements: Almost 97% of the students got placements, and many opportunities are available for internships. Our college has very good and highly recognised collaborations with big brands. The average salary package offered is 4 LPA, and the highest salary package offered is 8 LPA. Companies like Louis Vuitton, Gucci and Manish Malhotra also visited for internships. WGSN also visited our college.
review_content.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is good. Labs are very good, and the availability of products is maximum with appropriate quality. Canteen and other stationery items are sufficient. We have all types of machines needed for our projects. Collaborations and occasions are very helpful. Events are very helpful, and people who come to give knowledge are also of some level. Our college helps to improve our projects. Books are available in the library, which is very good.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Des in Fashion Design - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Our college is growing with good facilities and resources.

review_content.Placements: Companies visit our college for placements are well-recognised, but most of the students choose to start their own label. Students get placed with an average salary due to their portfolio, work experience and personal contacts as well. Students who did an internship in their 2nd year are quite high but with unpaid internships. Students of 3rd and 4th-year get better internship and stipend, even out of India.
review_content.Infrastructure: The quality of classrooms and labs are quite maintained and hygienic. The cafeteria serves a wide variety of food options at a reasonable price. Students also have access to E-library. The infrastructure of our college is beautiful.

admission_process.title: Pearl Academy New Friends Colony Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Pearl Academy, New Friends Colony admissions2025 have started. Candidates can pursue UG, PG and Professional Certificates in several specialisations at the campus. These are BDes, BBA, MBA, MDes, etc.Pearl Academy, New Friends Colony, admission is conducted in several cycles, and candidates can participate in all cycles. As per Pearl Academy admission process, candidates need to clear the Pearl Academy Entrance Exam, popularly known as the PAF Entrance Exam, followed by a Personal Interview (PI). PAF Entrance Exam consists of a General Proficiency Test (GPT) and a Design Aptitude Test (DAT). Students are allotted campuses according to their rank in the entrance test and the preferences filled in the application form.
Pearl Academy 2025 Admissions Open:

PA, NFC course admissionis completely merit-based & Entrance exam-based. Students seeking to apply for any of the courses offered at the college must fulfil the admission criteria of the desired programme before applying for it. Students can refer to the table below to know about the eligibility and selection criteria for some of thePearl Academy, New Friends Colony courses:

Pearl New Friends Colony fees are cumulative of multiple components such as tuition fee, refundable security deposit, registration fee, and alumni fee. An 18% GST is also included in the one-time fee payment. Candidates can check out the table below for the course-wise tuition fees:
NOTE:The above-mentioned fee is taken from an unofficial source. Hence, is indicative.

For admission to Pearl Academy New Friends Colony, candidates have to go through each of the stages of the admission procedure. The process involves online registration, entrance exams, selection rounds, and admission confirmation. More details about each of the stages in the admission process are explained below:
STEP 1: Pearl AcademyNew Friends ColonyApplication Process 2025

Candidates seeking admission at Pearl Academy New Friends Colony must fill out and submit a duly filled application form, provided they have met the basic eligibility criteria prescribed by the institute. The application fee for Bachelor's and Master's degree programmes is INR 2,000, and for Professional Certificate Courses is INR 500. Candidates can read more about thePearl Academy Application Form 2025to understand the procedure better.
STEP 2: Shortlisting of Students

Candidates who register successfully need to take the entrance test in the next step. ThePearl Academy Exam Resultsare published on the Pearl Academy's official website. Additionally, individual scorecards are also emailed to the students. The candidates are shortlisted based on their scores in the accepted entrance exams, like the Pearl Academy Entrance Exam.
STEP 3: Personal Interview
Shortlisted candidates must appear for the interview round.
STEP 4: Payment of Admission Fee & Admission Confirmation
Selected candidates must pay thePearl Academy NFC feeto confirm their admission.

faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA at Pearl Academy NFC?
faqs.answer: Pearl Academy, New Friends Colony offers MBA course for a duration of two year in a full-time mode. The tuition for MBA course ranges between INR 10.9 Lacs - INR 15.3 lakh. Apart from this, candidates also have to pay for one-time charges, which includes Alumni Fee, Registration Fees and Security Deposit (Refundable). This information is sourced from unofficial sources. Candidates are advised to visit the official website to know more about Pearl Academy MBA fee.

faqs.question: Is there a one-time fee payment at the Pearl Academy, New Friends Colony for MBA programme?
faqs.answer: Yes, in addition to semester-wise tuition, students enroling in the Pearl Academy, New Friends Colony MBA programme are required to pay a one-time fee of INR 82,000, which typically covers registration, alumni, and security charges. This fee is separate from the recurring semester fees and is part of the total programme cost.

faqs.question: What are the fees for BBA programmes at Pearl Academy New Friends Colony?
faqs.answer: The tuition fees for the BBA programme at Pearl Academy New Friends Colony in 2024 are between INR19.3 Lakh–25.3 Lakh . The BBA programme is three years long.

cafeteria.description:
The canteens in the Academy are equipped to provide all requirements of refreshments and lunch for the students.
Consumption of meals/snacks/beverages inside classrooms, Labs, Studios, and work areas is strictly prohibited. Water / Beverages are not permitted to be carried into Computer/CAD/Photography / Recreation Room or any other labs

labs.description: Available Facilities: Computer Lab, photography laboratory, photography studio, dark room, make-up studio, resource center, Fashion Design Studio, Pattern Making and Draping Lab, Garment Construction Lab, Textile Lab, Fashion Styling Lab, Design Studio, Makers’ Lab, Mac Lab, Wacom Lab

reviews.review_heading: The college has good faculty, infrastructure is good but the campus area is very small.
reviews.review_text: The college has a very modernised infrastructure with fully equipped security facility to centralised air-conditioning and lift facility. The college does not have its own hostel but the canteen food and medical facilities are present. The college is a fashion and technology college, so has less opportunity for sports and games.

reviews.review_heading: Overall performance of our college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good. Completely air conditioned. All the classrooms and labs are maintained. Earlier, the food of the canteen was not of a good quality but now they have a variety and good quality food. Stationary is also good, sells goods at a reasonable price. Stairs need to be maintained and lift too. Should have cross ventilation. We have a think tank where we work.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is amazing to be in.
reviews.review_text: Our college has huge classrooms and labs all over with high-speed Wi-Fi connectivity. The college building is fully air-conditioned. Our college has a maximum of its walls portrait with graphites. Our college has various rooms for all kinds of different activities related to the course like stitching room, photoshoot, stationery room, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is extremely good, but it is a bit high on the fee.
reviews.review_text: The campus has a building of 4 floors with all the courses on each floor. Walls had graffiti designs all over, and not even a single wall was plain or simple. All kinds of artwork were displayed on every corner and wall of the building. Furniture was also colourful.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is the biggest hub for fashion and design.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is good. Labs are very good, and the availability of products is maximum with appropriate quality. Canteen and other stationery items are sufficient. We have all types of machines needed for our projects. Collaborations and occasions are very helpful. Events are very helpful, and people who come to give knowledge are also of some level. Our college helps to improve our projects. Books are available in the library, which is very good.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is growing with good facilities and resources.
reviews.review_text: The quality of classrooms and labs are quite maintained and hygienic. The cafeteria serves a wide variety of food options at a reasonable price. Students also have access to E-library. The infrastructure of our college is beautiful.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 6 published reviews , 2 reviews are verified.

faqs.question: Does Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology accepts entrance exam for MTech?

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, Siddhartha Engineering College accepts Andhra Pradesh EAMCET scrores to shorlist candidates for admission to BTech courses. faqs.question: Does Siddhartha Engineering College accept Andhra Pradesh EAMCET?

faqs.answer: A:    There is no specific percentage criteria required in class 12 to appear in TSICET. However, candidates need to score a minimum passing percentage of 50% in their graduation to be eligible for TSICET exam. Further, candidates can check detail-wise eligibility criteria for TSICET:The eligibility criteria to appear in TSICET are:To apply for the state-level MBA entrance exam, candidates need to fulfil the TGICET eligibility criteria. The space below mentions the eligibility conditions to appear for the exam:Candidates should be graduates in any discipline with a minimum of 50 per cent aggregate (45 per cent for reserved category candidates)Final-year candidates are eligible to apply for TSICET 2025.Candidates should be Indian citizens and should also qualify all the guidelines of local/ non-local status as provided in the Andhra Pradesh Educational Institutions (Regulations of Admission) Order,1974.Foreign nationals aspiring for admission based on TSICET must fulfil general and special eligibility criteria mentioned by the concerned Universities.

admission_overview.college_name: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology Admission 2025: Eligibility, Selection Process, Application, Fee

admission_process.title: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering & Technology Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering & Technology admissionsare entrance-based. The institute considers TS EAMCET for UG and PGCET/ GATE/ ICET for PG programmes.Siddhartha Institute of Engineering & Technologyalso offers merit-based admission to candidates under Category-B admissions. The institute offers three courses at UG and PG levels in Engineering and Management streams in affiliation withJNTUH.

SIET admissions are based on the entrance exam scores of the candidates. Besides, aspirants must also fulfil the course-specific eligibility requirements. Below areSIET coursesalong with their eligibility and selection criteria:
GATE/TS PGECET
Note:In the absence of information on the official website, eligibility is taken as mentioned for the accepted entrance exam.

SIET admission process begins with registration followed by the selection process. Candidates need to first fill out the form for the preferred course. Below are the steps to get a seat in the institute:
Step 1: SIET Application Process 2025
Aspirants have to apply for any of the accepted entrance exams for admission. Candidates with a valid score can then register on the official website of the institute for the preferred programme.
Step 2: Selection

The institute shortlists candidates for BTech based on TS EAMCET scores. Aspirants seeking admission in MTech or MBA programmes need to pass GATE/ TS PGECET and TSICET, respectively. SIET also offers seats based on the merit of the aspirants in the qualifying exam. for category-B admission.
Step 3: Counselling & Seat Allotment

The institute calls the selected candidates for counselling and seat allotment. SIET allots seats to candidates based on their rank. Shortlisted aspirants need to pay theSIET feeto confirm their seat in the institute.

courses_data.description: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering & Technology offers a full-time MBA programme at the PG level. The course is offered for two-years. Admission to this course is entrance-based. Candidates are admitted based on their scores obtained in TSICET. To be eligible for the programme, candidates must have graduated in the relevant stream.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake for MBA at Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: The seat intake for the Master of Business Administration (MBA) programme at Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology is 60. The institute offers seats in MBA programme based on TSICET rank of the candidates. Besides, aspirants must also complete their graduation for admission. Selected candidates need to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the institute.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to MBA at Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology offers admission to MBA programme based on TSICET score of the candidates. The TSICET cutoff rank for admission toMBAfor the General HS candidates was33524, during the final round. The last-round cutoff rank for MBA was43543in 2023 and58672in 2022 for admission to the same course. Aspirants are alloted seat in MBA programme based on their rank in TSICET.

faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA at Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology MBA isINR 96,000. The JNTUH fee for MBA is INR 5,500 in the first year and INR 2,500 in the second year. Aspirants need to pay the course fee at the time of admission to confirm their seat in the institute. Besides, aspirants also need to pay a registration fee in the start to apply for admission.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake for M.Tech at Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: There are a total of 36 seats in M.Tech programme of Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology. Out of the total,  18 seats are available in each M.Tech specialisations. The institute offers seats to candidates based on GATE or TS PGECET scores. Once selected, candidates are offered seat based on their rank in the entrance exam.

faqs.question: What is the last date to apply for Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology admission?
faqs.answer: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering & Technology admissions 2025 are open online. Till now, no schedule has been released by the institute. Since the application portal is live, candidates can apply online for their preferred course. The institute offers courses, such as BTech, MTech and MBA at the UG and PG level. The institute is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad.

faqs.question: What entrance exam scores are accepted by Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology for admission?
faqs.answer: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology considers entrance exam scores for admission. Here are the entrance exam scores accepted by SIET for different courses:BTech: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering & Technology accepts TS EAMCET scores for admission to the BTech programme.MBA: SIET accepts entrance scores of TSICET for the MBA programme.MTech: Aspiring students must appear for and qualify the GATE or TS PGECET for admission to the MTech programme.

faqs.question: What is the qualification required for admission at SIET Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology has specified the minimum qualification and aggregate required to apply for a course. Aspirants need to fulfil both eligibility and selection requirements for admission. Below is course-wise eligibility for SIET:CourseCommon EligibilityBTechClass 12 in relevant subjectsMTechBTech or any other UG degreeMBAGraduation in any discipline with at least 50% aggregate

faqs.question: How to take admission in Siddhartha Institute of Engineering & Technology?
faqs.answer: Siddhartha Institute of Engineering and Technology selects candidates for BTech based on TS EAMCET scores. Aspirants seeking admission in MTech or MBA programmes need to pass GATE/ TS PGECET and TSICET, respectively. SIET also offers admission under Category-B to aspirants based on their merit in the last qualifying exam. Aspirants who are alloted seat need to pay the course fee for confirmation.

description: Siddhartha Engineering College cutoff 2025 has been released for admission to MBA programmes via the TSI ICET entrance examination result. Students should scroll down to this page to know the round, category, and year-wise cutoff for TSI ICET and other accepted exams. Refer to the pointers below for more updates:

Siddhartha Engineering College TSICET cutoff 2025 concluded with the cutoff release for all rounds and categories belonging to the AI and HS quotas. Among the General category students under the Home State quota, the cutoff for MBA in the last round was 31204. In comparison, with the OBC HS quota, the MBA programme last round cutoff rank was 44054, suggesting that the competition for General HS is higher than the OBC HS category.

The Siddhartha Engineering College MBA cutoff 2025 for the General HS category in the last round was 31204. In contrast, the cutoff in 2024 was 33524, and the 2023 cutoff was 43543 for the aforementioned course and category. According to this data, we can say that the competition for MBA has been increasing in the last 3 years.
Check the table below to know the year, round, category and quota-wise cutoff.

Siddhartha Engineering College TSICET Cutoff 2025 has been published for all rounds and categories belonging to the AI and HS quotas. Students who want to appear for the TSICET entrance exam to gain admission to the MBA courses can refer to the table below to know the important dates for the upcoming admission year.

Telangana Council of Higher Education conducts the TS ICET entrance exam annually for admission to the MBA. Students can refer to the table below to download the consolidated PDFs for 2025, 2024, and 2023.

For B.E. / B.Tech admission, the top three most competitive branches were B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering and B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning), with competitive TS EAMCET last round cutoff ranks of 24594, 63332 and 63411, respectively. These ranks are valid for the students belonging to the General HS quota.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure and faculty members.
reviews.review_text: All facilities are available in our college like Internet, labs, classrooms, library, AC, and lighting. In our hostel the food is average, and some facilities are also not good. In our hostel, in our canteen, the food is good, but there is less space like less tables and fewer chairs. Sports and games are also good. Medical facilities are also good.

reviews.review_heading: A good Tier-3 college.
reviews.review_text: Good facilities and infrastructure are provided in the college. However, there isn't college Wi-Fi. The hostel is good with good facilities. The hostel food is decent in both the canteen and mess. There aren't any particular medical facilities provided. I can say it is a good college.

reviews.review_heading: Dissatisfied with the extracurriculum.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure available in college is very poor like computers in lab don't have problems working but boards are little mess. Hostel food is poor which makes students eat from outside or in the canteen. There is no proper maintenance of food.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with the education provided by the college.
reviews.review_text: Labs are very good, neat, and clean. In the library, there are a lot of books related to subjects as well as some books related to developing knowledge.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college with good faculty members.
reviews.review_text: Facilities are good in this college. The college consists of many classes for all students and a canteen with reasonable prices. The library has a number of books for all students. It provides medical facilities, a transport facility, sports and games, etc.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college for good students.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure are good in our college. It provides above average facilities like neat classrooms as well as labs with AC and a canteen with different types of items. The library has so many books for all courses. It also has transport and sports facilities.

reviews.review_heading: There is a good environment around the college.
reviews.review_text: The campus environment is good. It has neat classrooms and labs with equipment. The canteen has different types of items. The campus hotel serves hygienic food, which is very useful for the health of students. There is free Wi-Fi in the hostel for all hostellers. It also has a transport facility.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good in this college. There is free Wi-Fi for all hostelers. The canteen is also available with tasty food at the lowest price. The campus hostel is available for both girls and boys with healthy food, neat rooms as well as games.

reviews.review_heading: This is a very good opportunity for middle class families.
reviews.review_text: The facilities of the hostel rooms are very neat, and the atmosphere is good. There is free Wi-Fi for all the hostellers. The labs are very good and maintained with daily washing, and they provide current facilities 24 hours. The quality of the food is good, and the canteen is also good.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good opportunity for middle-class family students.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is free of cost. Rooms are highly recommended, and there is a good atmosphere on campus. Food is of high quality in the mess and canteen.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good opportunity for middle-class family students.
reviews.review_text: Facilities of our hostel include free Wi-Fi with high speed. Labs are very good and neat. They wash rooms daily. Rooms are of high quality, and neatness is very good. They are maintained as the best of all other hostels. The quality of food is good.

reviews.review_heading: This is a great opportunity for middle-class families.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is generally available. Labs are well-equipped, and classrooms are often spacious, equipped with projectors. The library offers a variety of books. Room quality can vary, but AC rooms are usually preferred. The college provides washing machines, along with mess and canteen facilities.

reviews.review_heading: This is very good opportunity for middle class families.
reviews.review_text: The facilities include Wi-Fi availability and speed. The lab's equipment is maintained and safely measured. Cleanliness and maintenance room size and furnishings. Variety and nutritional value of meals in the mess and canteen. There is availability of a nurse or doctor on campus.

reviews.review_heading: It's much better for the lower and middle-class families.
reviews.review_text: The availability and quality of facilities are provided. Wi-Fi is generally available, sometimes campus-wide or limited to specific areas like labs and hostels. College usually have well-equipped labs and high-speed internet. Modern classrooms often include air-conditioners.

reviews.review_heading: The infrastructure of the college is very good.
reviews.review_text: The availability and quality of facilities can vary among institutions based on general information and recent typical facilities like wi-fi some sometimes campus-wide. Labs are generally available, though the equipment may vary in age and condition. Classrooms are usually spacious and modern.
