overview_faqs.question: What do Electrical Engineering professionals do?
overview_faqs.answer: Electrical Engineering professionals are engineering jack of all trades, as they make use of their knowledge of Physics and Mathematics along with computer programming skills to develop intricate circuit systems. These circuit boards run electrical signals to and from electrical components to accomplish everything from a mundane computer startup to controlling absolute power and precision of a rocket going out of earth's atmosphere.Know more about -Electrical Engineering Courses

review_summary.college_name: Loyola Institute of Technology and Management (LITM) Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: It's very good college.

content.Placements: Placements are mainly based on the situation right now, most of the placements happen from my college. Some students are also placed from my college, and these placements are happening in big multi-national companies in India right now.
content.Infrastructure: I'm a daily regular, not a hosteler, but about my college hostel facilities, they are good based on the rooms, as well as the food. Coming to the infrastructure of our course, it is very good, and nice courses are to learn from our college, mainly this is good.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2021
individual_reviews.title: It is a good option if you are not qualified in EAMCET.

content.Placements: The college provided good training for placements. But we have to do more hard work to get placed in any company as it is a tier-3 college. Getting placed is purely dependent on our score and knowledge. Hard work always pays off. We have to start preparing early to get placed.
content.Infrastructure: The college provides a central library and department library, which students can use for academic purposes. Students will be provided 3 library cards and can borrow books. We can renew them after every semester. The library has a lot of book collections, but they are not recent books.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2017
individual_reviews.title: Faculty members in our college lack knowledge.

content.Placements: Placements in our college are very few, and those placements do not provide excellent life to students. The students lack knowledge, and that leads to poor placements. Students need a strong foundation of knowledge in college, and the lecturers should build confidence in them.
content.Infrastructure: Practicals are not conducted in labs. The computer lab is average. There are no medical facilities. The college needs to improve the quality of education. It needs to improve practicals in labs for students to gain knowledge. Sports kits are very few, but the games are very interesting to play. It needs to improve equipment in labs.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2013
individual_reviews.title: Except placements remaining every thing is good and extraordinary.

content.Placements: Zero percent of placements in the college from last 5 years, zero percent of internships, college management is not supposed to provide some time for internships, no off campus have been done in my college, my previous batch also haven't got any placements from the management.
content.Infrastructure: Labs and facilities are too good, facilities in the classrooms and labs are fully high range and too good, no issues related to infrastructure during my tenure at the college, outside college people use to come to my college for labs and all, hostel facility is also available.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2014
individual_reviews.title: The review of Loyola Institute of Technology and Management.

content.Placements: There are no placements provided in the college. If placements happen also, all of them are call centres, fake companies, and maybe data entry jobs. They won't provide any internship at the time of the study. You should apply on your own in order to do an internship. They will accept to do so. They will not allow us to do our projects outside.
content.Infrastructure: The labs are well furnished, they do not provide any Wi-Fi facility. The canteen will change yearly twice, not sure about the food available in the canteen. The college is located outside the village, so there is a nice atmosphere to study and no disturbance. Bus facility is provided by the college, or you can have your own transportation.

highlights.summary:
National Insurance Academy admissions are open for 2026! The last date to apply for NIA College Pune admission is March 15, 2026. Students can visit the official website and apply.

The CAT 2026 registration is expected to start in the Aug, 2026 for admission to the MBA course.

faqs.question: Why should I take insurance as a specialization in MBA? Why should I choose NIA?
What is the placement scenario at National Insurance Academy?
What is the eligibility criteria for admission to PG Diploma at National Insurance Academy- NIA?

college_info.intro:
National Insurance Academy Pune popular course is the Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM). The curriculum of PGDM consists of 60% core Management subjects such as Finance, HR, Marketing, Analytics, and Technology. Along with this, there are 40% Insurance subjects, namely Life Insurance, General Insurance, Re-Insurance, and Pension. NIA has a 100% placement record. National Insurance Academy Pune alumni are working with different reputed multinationals, Indian Insurance companies, Insurance Brokers, and various other IT companies both abroad and in India.
Below mentioned are some of the courses offered by National Insurance Academy Pune and their respective eligibility:

Among the various scholarships, the Mahadeo Narayan Parchure Memorial Award is instituted by Dr. R K Parchure, Ex Faculty at NIA, in memory of his father Mahadeo N Parchure. The award consists of a Cash Prize and a certificate for excelling in Business and Insurance Law. The below-mentioned are scholarships awarded to the PGDM Batch 2019-21:

fees_and_eligibility.overview: NIA Pune courses includes the flagship PGDM programme, along with the PG Diploma course for students. These programmes are offered across different specialisations. NIA Pune provides dual expertise to the PGDM students; one in Insurance and the other in Management. PGDM students are given practical exposure and an opportunity to interact with different regulators, CEOs of insurance companies, and other professional bodies.

faqs.answer: A:    CAT cutoffs are usually not announced with the CAT result. The CAT cutoffs are also not released to the public.They are published after a few days of the result announcement when the IIMs and other colleges start their shortlisting process. The IIMs opens their shortlisting window based on the CAT cut-offs two to three days after the result announcement. The CAT percentile of candidates shortlisted for the Written Ability Test (WAT), Group Discussion (GD), and Personal Interview (PI) can be considered the cut-off for that IIM. For example, if a candidate with a CAT percentile of 99 belonging to the General category is selected for the WAT/GD-PI of IIM Calcutta, then the CAT cut-off for IIM Calcutta is 99 percentile. Only those candidates who make it to the WAT/GD-PI round of IIMs will get to know the cut-offs.
faqs.question: Are CAT cut offs announced along with the CAT result?

faqs.answer: A:    According to the NIA Pune expected CMAT Cutoff, the overall percentile required for admission to NIA Pune MBA course was 95 for the students belonging to the General All India category. For more information, click here.
faqs.question: What is the CMAT cutoff for NIA Pune?

faqs.answer: A:    National Insurance Academy PGDM fee for two years is INR 12 lakh. The NIA Pune PGDM fee structure comprises various fee elements other than the tuition fee. These items include hostel fees, admission fees, and other security deposits. The mentioned fee has been obtained from the official website/sanctioning body. It is still subject to change and, therefore, is indicative.
faqs.question: What is the total tuition fee for PGDM at NIA Pune?

faqs.answer: A:    National Insurance Academy has specified upper age limit for PGDM. Candidates belonging to General, EWS, OBC-NC category must be 28 years old or below. The age limit for SC/ ST/ PwD candidates is 30 years as on July 1,  2026.

reviews_list.batch_info: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Mecca of Insurance with 100% placements .

review_content.Placements: Top insurance companies/brokers and Insuretech companies come in zero-day for placements and the batch had 100% placements. This batch had a record of PPOs, the packages are at par with industry standards, the roles offered were Underwriters, claims, business analyst etc. All of them play a pivotal role in the insurance industry.
review_content.Infrastructure: The library is well maintained with real-time check-in and check-outs, resident doctors are present on the campus every day. The college has a well-equipped gym and games centre. It also has a swimming pool, sauna as add one. One of the drawbacks is that the hostel does not have a Wi-Fi but the hostel is cleaned every day by the housekeeping and proper hygiene is maintained.

reviews_list.batch_info: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2017
reviews_list.review_title: Satisfied with college, its campus, facilities and course. It was a great experience.

review_content.Placements: Excellent placement, with a minimum package of 6 Lacs. There is almost 100% placement. Companies from IT sector, insurance sector, broking, consultancy firm took participate in the placement. The lowest was 6 Lacs and the highest was 10 Lacs. Roles like Underwriter, B.A. manager were offered. 100% of student got internship from the college. There is a separate placement cell in the college, who looks the placement process.
review_content.Infrastructure: Excellent greenery campus with all the facilities. Campus has all the facilities like library with all the amenities. Computer labs. There is a separate gymkhana for boys and girls with swimming pool. Food quality is average, only on Saturday, there is a special dinner. Hostel rooms are big, enough for two boys. We did not faces any infrastructure issues during our course period.

overview_faqs.question: What is the fees for MBA at National Insurance Academy- NIA?
overview_faqs.answer: PGDM is a two-year management programme that costs Rs. 11.25 Lacs at the National Insurance Academy (NIA) in Pune. Besides areas such as human resource, marketing and finance, other management subjects include IT and insurance related topics. NIA presents its students with an opportunity of undertaking summer internships within private insurance companies from different Multinational corporations dealing with public sector general insurances. After successfully completing the course, one is likely to earn about Rs 7.56 Lacs per annum on average with leading placement firms being HDFC Bank, ICICI etc., among others.

overview_faqs.question: How can I withdraw the fee, which I have paid at NIA?
overview_faqs.answer: Please put a mail to the admission office regarding the same. Including your transaction details and to which account you want yo receive the same. NIA will be following all the procedures as per the AICTE rules and regulations for withdrawal of admission. Don't forget to mention your registration no. And the date of selection and GD/PI details.

overview_faqs.question: Why should I take insurance as a specialization in MBA? Why should I choose NIA?
overview_faqs.answer: PGDM program in NIA aims at providing management education with focus on Insurance to the younger generation especially the ones who would like to make a mark in the sunrise industry of insurance. The PGDM programme is run from the same campus where middle and senior level executives from insurance industry come for executive development programmes. The student get a chance of observing the executives from a close quarters and also get the opportunity to attend various National and International seminars along with the executives and listen to industry veterans. All the best

review_summary.college_name: National Insurance Academy Pune Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: NIA Pune - Gateway to the Indian private insurance sector.

content.Placements: 100 percent placements since inception. The highest package is around 22 LPA, and the average is around 13 LPA. Top recruiters include Bajaj General, HDFC Ergo General, Value Momentum, Marsh India Brokers, Capgemini, TATA AIG, Mahindra Insurance Brokers, and many others. 100 percent of the batch gets summer internships in the general insurance, life insurance, insuretech, and brokers sectors, with almost more than 50 percent of batch getting PPO. Top roles offered are Underwriting, Claims Management, Insurance Consulting, Business Analyst, and B2B Sales.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: PGDM at NIA opens up a world of opportunities.

content.Placements: NIA offers 100% placements from its inception. This year, the average package offered is 10.3 LPA. The highest package offered was 29.5 LPA. 30% of the batch got PPOs during their summer internships. Core insurance roles, B.A roles and consulting roles are the major roles offered.
content.Infrastructure: The NIA campus is beautiful. The classrooms, hostels and library are the best in class. All necessary modern amenities are provided in the hostels. Modern sports and gym facilities are available. The mess is attached to the hostel, which serves decent food.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: Mecca of Insurance with 100% placements .

content.Placements: Top insurance companies/brokers and Insuretech companies come in zero-day for placements and the batch had 100% placements. This batch had a record of PPOs, the packages are at par with industry standards, the roles offered were Underwriters, claims, business analyst etc. All of them play a pivotal role in the insurance industry.
content.Infrastructure: The library is well maintained with real-time check-in and check-outs, resident doctors are present on the campus every day. The college has a well-equipped gym and games centre. It also has a swimming pool, sauna as add one. One of the drawbacks is that the hostel does not have a Wi-Fi but the hostel is cleaned every day by the housekeeping and proper hygiene is maintained.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2017
individual_reviews.title: Satisfied with college, its campus, facilities and course. It was a great experience.

content.Placements: Excellent placement, with a minimum package of 6 Lacs. There is almost 100% placement. Companies from IT sector, insurance sector, broking, consultancy firm took participate in the placement. The lowest was 6 Lacs and the highest was 10 Lacs. Roles like Underwriter, B.A. manager were offered. 100% of student got internship from the college. There is a separate placement cell in the college, who looks the placement process.
content.Infrastructure: Excellent greenery campus with all the facilities. Campus has all the facilities like library with all the amenities. Computer labs. There is a separate gymkhana for boys and girls with swimming pool. Food quality is average, only on Saturday, there is a special dinner. Hostel rooms are big, enough for two boys. We did not faces any infrastructure issues during our course period.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2018
individual_reviews.title: The best institute to study in.

content.Placements: National Insurance Academy holds a record 100% placement since inception and has been regarded as one of best colleges in insurance industry. Regular recruiters include IFFCO Tokio GIC, SBI Life, SBI General, Bajaj Allianz GIC, Hlobal insurance brokers, etc.
content.Infrastructure: Campus of National Insurance Academy is spread over 32 acres with facilities live indoor badminton court, gymnasium, pool table, etc. It has world-class lecture halls. The institute also have an amazing library which includes journals, books and newletters.

faqs.question: Is there any age limit for PGDM at National Insurance Academy?

faqs.answer: National Insurance Academy Pune does not give admission without an entry examination. The application in the course requires CAT or CMAT scores. The students are short-listed based on their performance during the exams. Application forms are not accepted without entrance scores.
faqs.question: Can I get admission at National Insurance Academy Pune without an entrance exam?

faqs.answer: National Insurance Academy Pune does not grant admission solely on the basis of Class 12 marks. The institute offers only postgraduate programs that require a graduation degree. Candidates must also qualify in entrance tests like CAT or CMAT. The eligibility criteria focus more on postgraduate entry than undergraduate marks.
faqs.question: Can I take admission to National Insurance Academy Pune with Class 12 score?

faqs.answer: CAT cutoffs are usually not announced with the CAT result. The CAT cutoffs are also not released to the public.They are published after a few days of the result announcement when the IIMs and other colleges start their shortlisting process. The IIMs opens their shortlisting window based on the CAT cut-offs two to three days after the result announcement. The CAT percentile of candidates shortlisted for the Written Ability Test (WAT), Group Discussion (GD), and Personal Interview (PI) can be considered the cut-off for that IIM. For example, if a candidate with a CAT percentile of 99 belonging to the General category is selected for the WAT/GD-PI of IIM Calcutta, then the CAT cut-off for IIM Calcutta is 99 percentile. Only those candidates who make it to the WAT/GD-PI round of IIMs will get to know the cut-offs.
faqs.question: Are CAT cut offs announced along with the CAT result?

paragraphs: The admission process includes online registration, entrance exams, selection rounds, and admission confirmation.
National Institute of Academy ApplicationProcess 2026
Candidates can apply online for the course. Aspirants have to pay INR 1,500.
Candidates are shortlisted for admission based on their CAT, XAT or CMAT scores. Check below expectedNIA cutofffor selection:
Shortlisted students are called for group discussion and personal interview round for final selection. The academy also considers the work experience and past academic performance of the aspirants.
Payment of Fee & Admission Confirmation

The institute also releases a merit list based on the composite score of the students for admission. Shortlisted aspirants need to come for document verification. Candidates also need to pay theNational Institute of Academy feesto confirm their seats at the institute.

faqs.question: What is the selection process at National Insurance Academy Pune?
faqs.answer: The shortlisting performed by National Insurance Academy Pune consists of CAT/CMAT score and then there are GD, PI, and WAT.Previous academic achievement and working experience are also of concern.There is a final merit list on the basis of composite scores.The students who are chosen have to go through document verification and fees.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in National Insurance Academy Pune?
faqs.answer: No direct admission is permitted in the National Insurance Academy Pune under any category.The basis of the admission is exclusively determined by the CAT or CMAT, GD and PI.Selection of candidates is done on performance and merit.Even categories reserved have to comply with the process of entrance-based.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at National Insurance Academy?
faqs.answer: National Insurance Academy offers admission to candidates based on CAT, XAT or CMAT scores of the aspirants for PGDM. Selected candidates have to further pass the group discussion and personal interview round. The academy also considers past academic performance and work experience of the aspirants.

faqs.question: What percentage is required for admission in National Insurance Academy Pune?
faqs.answer: The minimum requirement of marks in graduation at National Insurance Academy Pune is 55%.The students belonging to the category, SC/ST/OBC-NC/DA shall be required to be 50%.Provisionally those in final year can apply.

female students. It has 24 hours uninterrupted power and water supply. Round the clock security is provided in the hostel and in the rest of the campus. There is also the Internet facility with Wi-Fi connectivity for the students in the rooms.

reviews.review_heading: NIA Pune - Gateway to the Indian private insurance sector.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi access throughout the campus, huge classrooms, and specialized insurance labs for research. NIA's library is vast and among the best for insurance studies. Food is really good, there is a swimming pool, sauna, gym, basketball court, and cricket/football ground. There is an on-campus clinic too.

reviews.review_heading: PGDM at NIA opens up a world of opportunities.
reviews.review_text: The NIA campus is beautiful. The classrooms, hostels and library are the best in class. All necessary modern amenities are provided in the hostels. Modern sports and gym facilities are available. The mess is attached to the hostel, which serves decent food.

reviews.review_heading: Mecca of Insurance with 100% placements .
reviews.review_text: The library is well maintained with real-time check-in and check-outs, resident doctors are present on the campus every day. The college has a well-equipped gym and games centre. It also has a swimming pool, sauna as add one. One of the drawbacks is that the hostel does not have a Wi-Fi but the hostel is cleaned every day by the housekeeping and proper hygiene is maintained.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied with college, its campus, facilities and course. It was a great experience.

Swimming pool, badminton court, TT table,  8 lecture halls, Full-size amphitheatre, and much more. The campus has 1.8 Km jogging track inside it.

reviews.review_heading: There is insurance, placements and fun.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure in NIA is simply world class. All the lecture halls are air-conditioned and are properly equipped with the state of the art equipment. We have a library which is very easily the best library in Asia for the subject matter of insurance. A gym, table tennis, swimming pool, badminton and all the other recreational facilities are there on the campus. The campus itself is one of it's kind of lush greenery of utter grace.

reviews.review_heading: At par with top grade institutes and " a leader" when it comes to insurance.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure-wise, it is really good. It offers almost all recreational activities and a lovely beautiful resort like a campus, an MBBS doctor is present on the campus, post office and a bank is also there on the campus. The labs and classrooms are fully air-conditioned. The library is the finest having all good quality journals, books, research papers, and magazines. One who is an avid reader will have a good time here. The quality of food is good(sometimes may not be, but that is acceptable)...

reviews.review_heading: Excellent college for people who want to be in BFSI.
reviews.review_text:
The infrastructure of the college is super awesome and the design inspires learning and excellence. All the necessary infra facilities are available. Wi-Fi speed is good. Classrooms are spacious, the library has the latest edition books and the mess food is average. 
Sports facilities are there but need improvement.

reviews.review_heading: Best decision, you'll ever make.
reviews.review_text: The academy is located within 8 km from the main city and beside the Mumbai-Pune-Bengaluru highway. It is a lush green 32-acre campus with all the essential facilities available for swimming pool, basketball court, lawn tennis court, sauna, indoor badminton court, for recreational activities. The college does not have Wi-Fi facility, but they have LAN network in every room. We have an IT department that monitors the network. review_summary.college_name: DoMS Nalsar Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: Great colleges and solid educational support for every student. The teachers are true professionals.

content.Placements: Each year, a minimum of 90% of our college students obtain job placements. The average salary package offered to graduates is 8 LPA. The highest package soared to 22 LPA. Prominent companies recruiting for our programme include TATA Motors, Amazon, Zomato, and Infosys, among others.
content.Infrastructure: The facilities at my college are outstanding. We have a diverse array of amenities available. There is Wi-Fi, computer labs, a library, a canteen, and more, with the food quality in the canteen being quite good. Furthermore, a variety of sports and games are available, including table tennis, cricket, and football.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: My honest review of my college.

content.Placements: I am pleased to say that in the legal world in India, it is an undisputed fact that NALSAR has the highest placements in the corporate sector and otherwise, even surpassing other contemporaries and rivals like NLSIU, NUJS, NLU-J, NLIU, etc. The job opportunities in a top-tier law school are too diverse and endless. From corporate to government to litigation to academia, the discretion is totally one's own.
content.Infrastructure: Life in a college hostel is full of pleasure and charm. It is usually located within the premises of the college.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Good experience and lifestyle, but not great placements.

content.Placements: Minimum 50% of the students get placed, but at the same time, they are not placed in well-off companies or areas. They are being offered a lower package as compared to that of IIMs and ISBs, whose students get much better offers. However, since there is the tag of NALSAR, people manage to get good internships at companies.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is something that can be given to NALSAR because their infrastructure is really great. From Wi-Fi in the classrooms to the basic facilities in the hostel, everything is really good and they are updated with recent techs too. The food at the mess is mediocre but still has a decent standard.

individual_reviews.course: BBA + MBA (IPM) - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Really good infrastructure and faculty members for the course offered.

content.Placements: The placements are really good on campus, and more than half of the batch gets placed. Though the package is lesser than any other IIMs or other business schools, still it's pretty good. Moreover, the RCC on campus is also very specific about the firms or companies that come for placements.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is really good for the course that is being provided. There are dedicated digital boards for each classroom, which is really helpful in understanding the concepts and ideas better than the normal way of teaching. There is also a dedicated hostel for the course students.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Why NALSAR is the best value for money college in the field of law.

content.Placements: Out of those who sat for placements, 95% of them got placed in well-known firms. Others chose to pursue alternative career paths. The alumni base is also very sophisticated, and the college's name alone helps in securing internships at desired places. Students passing out from this college are also well-known for pursuing further studies such as LL.M., UPSC, etc.
content.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is a significant issue here. However, all other basic necessities are easily available. The mess is comparatively good enough, and the library is the best among all NLUs, with over 52,000 books. Classrooms are fully digital, featuring modern infrastructure. The moot court hall is excellent, and the campus is lush and green. There is also an Olympic-standard football turf, often used for relaxation with friends. A lake nearby serves as a stress reliever, and visits to the lake can be very calming.

admission_process.title: DoMS at NALSAR University Admission Process 2026

paragraphs: Department of Management Studies, Nalsar University admission process includes registration, fee payment, document submission, offer letter and confirmation. Candidates must follow the below steps to get a seat in the Department of Management Studies, Nalsar University Pune:
STEP 1: Department of Management Studies, Nalsar University Pune Application Process 2026
Candidates are required to apply online on the official website of the college. Students need to pay an application fee ofINR 2,200for MBA. The application fee for SC/ ST/ OBC/ EWS/ PwD isINR 1,500.
STEP 2: Selection Rounds

Department of Management Studies, Nalsar University Pune shortlists candidates based on national-level entrance exams, university-based entrance exam scores, and SOP+ GD-PI for MBA. Admission to IPM course is based on NMET (UG) or IPMAT scores of the candidates. Below are the selection parameters for MBA:
STEP 3: Merit List andAdmission Confirmation

Once selection rounds are over, the college releases a merit list. Selected candidates receive the offer letter. To allot and confirm the seat, candidates must pay theDoMS Nalsar University feesto confirm their seat.

courses_data.name: DoMS at NALSAR University MBA Admissions 2026
courses_data.description: DoMS, Nalsar University offers MBA courses at the PG level. Admission to these courses is based on NMET-PG, CAT, XAT or GMAT scores. Candidates, whose score is 70 percentile and above in the CAT exam and 600 & above in GMAT, need not appear for N-MET PG. Aspirants must complete graduation with 50% aggregate to apply for MBA.

faqs.question: How can I get MBA admission at DoMS, Nalsar University?
faqs.answer: To apply for DoMS, Nalsar University, candidates need to complete graduation with 50% aggregate. The student has to appear for Nalsar Management Entrance Test for the course admission. The admissions to the MBA course will be made taking into account the CAT/ XAT/ GMAT/ Nalsar Management Entrance Test (NMET) scores + SOP + Group Discussion+ Personal Interview.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MBA at DoMS, Nalsar University?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to complete any UG degree or an equivalent with at least 50% aggregate can apply for the Department of Management Studies, Nalsar University. Aspirants must hold the documents proving their eligibility for verification. Besides, candidates applying for MBA course, need to qualify for N-MET PG. Apart from this, candidates who have valid CAT/ XAT/ GMAT scores are exempted from the N-MET PG exam. However, these candidates have to appear for all the other evaluation components.

faqs.question: How much is the MBA fee at DoMS Nalsar University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for MBA at Department of Management Studies NALSAR University ranges betweenINR 4.2 lakhandINR 10.8 lakh. The total fee includes caution deposit, exam fee, tuition fee, etc. Candidates must pay the course fee at the time of admission to confirm their seat.

faqs.question: Are there any additional expenses for MBA students at DOMS?
faqs.answer: Candidates have to pay additional expenses such as other academic fees of INR 1 lakh, room rent of INR 24,000, internet charges of INR 8,000, etc. apart from the tuition fees for MBA at Department of Management Studies.

faqs.question: What is the total BBA+ MBA (IPM) course tuition fee at DoMs, Nalsar University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for the BBA at DoMS NALSAR is INR 10.8 lakh. Candidate also has to pay a one-time and hostel fee. The one-time fee is INR 5,000 and the hostel fee is INR 2.55 lakh. Students can check below for more details:Fee ComponentAmountOne-time feeINR 5,000Hostel feeINR 2.55 lakhThis information is sourced from the official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: Are there any additional expenses for BBA students at DOMS?
faqs.answer: Candidates apart from tuition fees also need to pay other additional charges. Aspirants opting for hostel facility have to pay a room rent of INR 24,000, internet charges of INR 8,000, etc. Aspirants also have to pay other academic fees of INR 1 lakh.

faqs.question: What is the category-wise seat distribution for the DOMS BBA 2025 intake?
faqs.answer: There are 33 seats available in BBA course DoMS for General catgory (25 for All India students and 8 for Telangana students). 14 seats are available for OBC, 9 for SC, 6 for EWS and 4 for ST category students.

faqs.question: Is it possible to get admission to BBA at DOMS without NMET?
faqs.answer: Candidates are offered admission in BBA course  of DOMS based on score in NMET-UG. However, aspirants can also get admission based on their IPMAT scores.

faqs.question: What is the BBA + MBA (IPM) admission procedure at DoMS, Nalsar University?
faqs.answer: The admissions to the Integrated BBA-MBA degree programme will be made considering the NMET (UG)/IPMAT (IIM, Indore) followed by PI. The admissions will be offered on merit to those who clear any one of the above tests. However, 75 % weightage will be given for the performance in the aforementioned entrance examinations; 25 % weightage will be given to the performance at in personal interview for the preparation of the merit list.The marks obtained in the above-mentioned entrance exam scores, and tests will be converted into percentages and based on merit at the test the candidates will be short-listed for personal interview. If a candidate appears for more than one test, the best of the two scores will be considered by the University.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for course admission at DoMS, Nalsar University?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Department of Management Studies, Nalsar University offers admission to MBA courses either through state-level entrance exam which isCATor university based entrance exam which is Nalsar Management Entrance Test. The university offers admission to BBA + MBA (IPM) courses based on a university-based entrance exam or (IPMAT IIM, Indore) score. The IPMAT question paper is divided into three sections, i.e. Verbal Ability, Quantitative Aptitude (MCQs) and Quantitative Aptitude (SA).

faqs.question: What is the procedure for foreign students seeking direct admission to DOMS MBA?
faqs.answer: Foreign national can apply directly for MBA at DoMS without appearing for NMET-PG or CAT. There are a total of 13 seats reserved for foreign students.

faqs.question: What is the application process of DOMS Nalsar?
faqs.answer: Department of Management Studies Nalsar University application window is open. Below mentioned are the step-by-step application process:Visit the official website of the college.Register yourself and verify your email ID.Pay theDOMS application fees.Fill out theDepartment of Management Studies admissionform thoroughly.Submit the form carefully.

placement_data.title: Department of Management Studies NALSAR University Placement Overview 2025
paragraphs: The DoMS NALSAR placement report 2025 is yet to be released. Once out, it will be updated on this page. The Department of Management Studies, NALSAR University has released the MBA placement report for 2024. As per the report, the highest package offered stood at INR 12 LPA for the MBA program. The average and median packages offered stood at INR 7.48 LPA and INR 7.5 LPA , respectively. In total, 30 recruiters took part in the placement drive and top recruiters include- Deloitte USA, ADP, KPMG and many more. The DoMS NALSAR has released the summer internship reports as well, the highest stipend offered was INR 50000 Thousand Per Month . Moreover, the MBA Marketing branch was the top domain during the placements 2024 with 52% share. The season saw recruitments from other domains such as Finance (33%), Business Analytics (3%), HR (9%) and Legal (3%) .

Earlier during the DoMS NALSAR placement drive for MBA 2023 and 2022, the highest packages stood at INR 10.10 LPA and INR 9 LPA , respectively. Moreover, the average packages offered during 2023 and 2022 were INR 7.06 LPA and INR 7.35 LPA , respectively. The median packages for 2023 and 2022 were INR 7.50 LPA each. During the placement season 2022, 100% placement rate was recorded.

cut_off.college_name: DoMS Nalsar Cutoff 2026 (Out): Check CLAT Round Wise Ranks

description: Department of Management Studies, NALSAR University cutoff 2026 is available on this page for five-year integrated LLB and LLM courses. The cutoff is released for different categories under the AI and HS quota. To view the cutoff ranks, refer to the sections provided below. Further updates related to CLAT 2026 are below:

Department of Management Studies, NALSAR University CLAT cutoff 2026 is out for Round 1. In this section, candidates can view the first round closing ranks for all the courses/specialisations offered at Department of Management Studies, NALSAR University. For the General AI quota, the CLAT first round closing rank is 108 for admission to the LL.M. course.

Department of Management Studies, NALSAR University LL.M. cutoff 2026 is 108 in the first round of admission for the General AI category students. CLAT Round 1 cutoff 2026 for the same course is 306 in the OBC AI category.
For other rounds, categories, etc., use the filter option provided below:

CLAT 2026 counselling registrations are now closed. The counselling process is completely online, including registration, publishing of the merit list, and then seat allotment as per the preferences marked by the aspirants. Candidates who appear for the counselling rounds can refer to the table below to view or download the consolidated year- and round-wise cutoff list. The cutoff list is available in the form of PDFs.

reviews.review_heading: Great colleges and solid educational support for every student. The teachers are true professionals.
reviews.review_text: The facilities at my college are outstanding. We have a diverse array of amenities available. There is Wi-Fi, computer labs, a library, a canteen, and more, with the food quality in the canteen being quite good. Furthermore, a variety of sports and games are available, including table tennis, cricket, and football.

reviews.review_heading: My honest review of my college.
reviews.review_text: Life in a college hostel is full of pleasure and charm. It is usually located within the premises of the college.

reviews.review_heading: Good experience and lifestyle, but not great placements.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is something that can be given to NALSAR because their infrastructure is really great. From Wi-Fi in the classrooms to the basic facilities in the hostel, everything is really good and they are updated with recent techs too. The food at the mess is mediocre but still has a decent standard.

reviews.review_heading: Really good infrastructure and faculty members for the course offered.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is really good for the course that is being provided. There are dedicated digital boards for each classroom, which is really helpful in understanding the concepts and ideas better than the normal way of teaching. There is also a dedicated hostel for the course students.

reviews.review_heading: Why NALSAR is the best value for money college in the field of law.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is a significant issue here. However, all other basic necessities are easily available. The mess is comparatively good enough, and the library is the best among all NLUs, with over 52,000 books. Classrooms are fully digital, featuring modern infrastructure. The moot court hall is excellent, and the campus is lush and green. There is also an Olympic-standard football turf, often used for relaxation with friends. A lake nearby serves as a stress reliever, and visits to the lake can be very c...

reviews.review_heading: Colleges offer good placement opportunities.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college was good for our course. The college had good-quality facilities for the students. Wi-Fi, labs, library, canteen, classrooms, etc. for the students of the college. All these facilities were of good quality. Canteen food was good to eat. Sports and medical facilities were also available for the students.

reviews.review_heading: Great campus and library with good placements at this college.
reviews.review_text: The facilities for my course at NALSAR are top-notch. Modern classrooms, well-equipped labs and a vast library support our learning. Hostel amenities are good with decent food and medical services. Sports facilities enhance the overall experience.

reviews.review_heading: Nalsar has a great college life but a rigorous academic life.
reviews.review_text:
We have smart-airconditioned classrooms and spacious dual-sharing hostel rooms. The infrastructure is quite satisfactory. Wi-fi is available almost everywhere on campus with good speed. Unfortunate, the library is non-airconditioned. The quality of food in the mess is good, you get various and variety of options on a daily basis. In comparison to other private colleges, the mess food in nalsar is good! 
You have an option of a special veg or a special non-veg paid items in dinner everyday. ( Usu...

reviews.review_heading: With good companies in placements list, Dorms NALSAR is going to be a star.
reviews.review_text: Excellent infrastructure. Excellent atmosphere away from the city. Nature-friendly. 24/7 doctor/medical assistant. Good sports, healthy canteen and mess. Classrooms with good infrastructure. The library is open almost 18 hours a day with numerous books, journals, references.

reviews.review_heading: Beautiful Environment, Qualified faculty members and good infrastructure!
reviews.review_text:
1. Great infrastructure, Neat classrooms, Wi-fi facility, Library, Printing & xerox, College material for specific subjects. 
2. Facilities in the hostel were good but the only problem was the unavailability of hot water at times and Mess food was not at all satisfactory and Our MBA students haven't got many facilities to play sports.

reviews.review_heading: The best campus, good faculty & lively people around.
reviews.review_text:
1. The facilities provided are amazing, NALSAR is a renouned law University they have started this programme of MBA where they want to create MBA's who are legally aware. Top infrastructure Wi-Fi enabled campus, top classrooms etc. 
2. Hostel facilities are on campus as the college is huge there is auditorium, stadium and very big library. Food is average but they serve on time and freshly cooked.

reviews.review_heading: An amazing academy to study and have good exposure.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is good. The campus has a lot of greenery. The library is amazing and huge. Hostels are maintained clean, and one room is allotted for 2 people. For seniors, one room is allotted for one person, and no room has an attached washroom. The campus has a positive atmosphere. Classrooms are well-furnished and maintained, each class has one projector.

reviews.review_heading: It is a perfect college, and I am happy with alma mater of this college.
reviews.review_text: Everything is good and up to the mark because our college is second rank NLU of India. Mess quality is good, and both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food are provided as per the comfortability. They provided 2 times meal, including breakfast and snacks. Library facility is available, and we are able to access online books through which we can read the latest and new books.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 13 published reviews , 12 reviews are verified.

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Thakur Global Business School offers only one course. The institute offers a PGDM programme of two years. The institute considers valid scores of accepted entrance exams such as CAT, CET, XAT, CMAT, ATMA, MAT, and GMAT. The fee structure of the courses offered at TGBS covers a total tuition fees of worth INR 11 lakhs. In addition to that the university offers workshops/trainings/seminars/masterclasses and industrial visits to aid candidates in upskilling themselves and getting on-ground experience of the job market.

faqs.answer: A:    Thakur Global Business School PGDM programme has annual fees of INR 5.5 Lakhs for the minimum two-year programme. As such the total tuition fee of the programme is INR 11 lakhs.This fee may be higher if the student decides to avail hostel accomodations. If candidate has not availed the hostel accomodation they do not have to pay the additional cost.
faqs.question: How much does PGDM course cost in Thakur Global Business School?

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, candidates do not have to worry about their PCM scores while applying for admission into the PGDM programme at Thakur Global Business School because PGDM admission takes place through the merit secured in CAT, CET, XAT, CMAT, ATMA, MAT, and GMAT entrance exams. Before applying for admission into the programme candidates are required to have a minimum aggregate of 50% in graduation to be eligible for the course.

review_content.Placements: The college has successfully placed 100% of the students in our batch. TGBS holds a stellar track record for placing its graduates in renowned organizations across various industries, like RBL Bank, Trends, and Federal Bank. The average package offered is 6.5 lacs, and the highest package offered is 11.5 lacs.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure at TGBS is top-notch, providing students with a good environment for learning and personal development. The campus is well-maintained and aesthetically pleasing, with a lush green campus. The campus and classrooms are spacious and well-maintained.

reviews_list.batch_info: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2025
reviews_list.review_title: One of the best colleges if a student is looking for a PGDM course.

review_content.Placements: The highest salary package offered is 11.4 LPA, and the average salary package offered is 6.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Anand Rathi, ISS, RBL Bank, Godrej, and Aditya Birla. Visit our campus. Almost all students get internships in Bajaj Alliance, says Anand Rathi.
review_content.Infrastructure: Our college is well-equipped with all the necessary tools and facilities that a college would require to impart knowledge. Our college is fully air-conditioned; it has a computer lab, a physical library, as well as a digital library. Every class has a projector, computer, and audio system. Our college has a recreation lab and a mindful lab.

admission_process.title: Thakur Global Business School Admission Process 2026

paragraphs: Thakur Global Business School admission 2026 is open. Admission to the courses is completelyentrance-based.Thakur Global Business Schooloffers two-yearPGDM programmesacross multiple specialisations. The course curriculum is designed in collaboration with international and national organisations according to the prevailing industry trends and corporate requirements. To get admission, candidates are required to qualify for one entrance exam, such as CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ ATMA/ GMAT/ CMAT/ MHCET to participate in the selection process. Interested candidates can apply online on the official website of the institute for PGDM courses. More details about Thakur Global Business School admission are elaborated in the article below.

Thakur Global Business School admission is entrance-based. The institute considers multiple parameters while offering admission, which includes fulfilling the minimum eligibility and selection criteria as per the course requirements. The institute offers a full-time AICTE-approved PGDM programme with a duration of two-years. Tabulated below are theThakur Global Business School courseeligibility and selection criteria:
Pass a Bachelor's degree with 50% marks (45% for reserved categories) from a recognised university. The final-year students appearing for exams in 2026 can also apply
CAT/ MAHCET/XAT/CMAT/ATMA/ MAT/GMAT
Download:Thakur Global Business School PGDM Brochure

There is a process through which candidates have to go through to get enrolled in the programme. Before applying, the students should go through the minimum educational qualification. Check below the detailed steps for the Thakur Global Business School admission process:
STEP 1: TGBS Mumbai Application Process 2026

Eligible candidates can fill out the admission form through the TGBS official website (tgbsmumbai.in). For registration, details such as name, email address, mobile number, and other such details have to be filled out. After registering, candidates can log in using their registered email and password to fill out the application form.
STEP 2: Shortlisting of Students for Selection Rounds

Thakur Global Business School admissions are entirely entrance-based for its programmes. The institute considers scores of various national-level entrance exams such asMAT/ CAT/ XAT/ ATMA/CMAT/ GMAT/MHCETto shortlist eligible candidates.
STEP 3: Admission Confirmation
Once, all the selection rounds are completed, the selected candidates must pay a certain amount ofThakur Global Business School feesto confirm their seats.

courses_data.name: Thakur Global Business School PGDM Admission 2026
courses_data.description: Thakur Global Business School offers PGDM at the PG level. This programme is offered for a duration of 2 years under four specialisations, such as PGDM in Finance, PGDM in Marketing, PGDM in HRM, PGDM in Business Analytics and PGDM in Operations. PGDM admission at TGBS is based on a valid CAT/XAT/CMAT/MH-CET/ATMA, etc. entrance exams and past academic background. Further, the final selection is based on candidates' performance in GD and PI rounds. Additionally, candidates seeking admission must fulfil the basic eligibility i.e.Pass a Bachelor's degree with 50% marks (45% for reserved categories) from a recognised university. The final-year students appearing for exams in 2026 can also apply. Some more important highlights forThakur Global Business School PGDM admissionare given below:

faqs.question: Is admission to PGDM course at Thakur Global Business School merit or entrance exam based?
faqs.answer: Admission to PGDM course at TGBS Mumbai is done based on candidates’ performance in one of the entrance exams such as CAT, XAT, MAT, CMAT, ATMA, GMAT or MAH CET. Hence, the selection is entrance-based. However, apart from this, the other factors considered during final selection are:Academic RecordLevel of participation in group discussion and personal interviewSports, Extracurricular activities and Co-Curricular activities

faqs.question: How many seats are available for PGDM at Thakur Global Business School?
faqs.answer: The total number of seats available for TGBS Mumbai PGDM course is120. Aspirants are admitted in the programme in accordance with the seat intake.

faqs.question: Which PGDM specialisations does Thakur Global Business School offer?
faqs.answer: Thakur Global Business School offers a two-year PGDM course in a full-time mode. Candidates can pursue PGDM course across four specialisations. Find them below:PGDM in FinancePGDM in MarketingPGDM in HRMPGDM in OperationsPGDM in Business Analytics

faqs.question: How can I get admission to  PGDM course at Thakur Global Business School?
faqs.answer: Thakur Global Business School PGDM admission takes place through theMAT, XAT, CAT, CMAT, ATMA, MAH CETentrance exams. Candidates who wish to apply for the PGDM programme will have to make sure that they get a valid score in any one of these exams to be eligible for admission into the programme. Once the results are out, candidates can apply for admission in PGDM at TGPS through the institute website.

faqs.question: What all courses are offered by Thakur Global Business School?
faqs.answer: Thakur Global Business School offers a two-year PGDM programme at the PG level in four specialisations. The PGDM programme offered at the institute is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).TGBS PGDM programme is extended in the specialisations of: PGDM in Finance, PGDM in Marketing, PGDM in HRM, PGDM in Business Analytics and PGDM in Operations.To be eligible for admission, candidates are required to complete the course eligibility set by the institute.

faqs.question: Is the PGDM application process at Thakur Global Business School conducted in offline mode?
faqs.answer: Thakur Global Business School  application process is both online and offline. As per the details mentioned on college's official website, candidates can get the application form and admission brochure for INR 1000. Admission form will also be available at the counter of TGBS on all working days from 9.30 A.M. to 5.30 P.M. Candidates can submit application forms at the TGBS counter.

placement_data.title: Thakur Global Business School Placement Overview 2025
paragraphs: The placement process at Thakur Global Business School includes a comprehensive pre-placement training and skill development program for the students. Students are put through workshops, guest lectures, seminars and simulation exercises to become ready to meet the ever-changing corporate challenges. To name a few, training program on Equity Trading & Investments, Financial Modeling; National Institute of Securities Markets (NISM).

Thakur Global Business School has concluded the placements for the PGDM batch passed out in 2024 with a 100% placement rate . As per the latest report, the highest and average package offered during Thakur Global Business School placements 2024 stood at INR 15 LPA and INR 6 LPA, respectively. Some of the top regular recruiters of Thakur Global Business School include Infosys, Godrej, Decathlon, DTDC, Tech Mahindra, TCS, Flipkart, Adani Group, EY, KPMG, Jio , etc.

reviews.review_heading: The best college one can have.
reviews.review_text: TGBS has modern classroom facilities, spacious classrooms with comfortable seating, and audio-visual equipment. A well-stocked library with a vast collection of books, journals, research papers, and an online database. High-speed internet connectivity throughout campus.

reviews.review_heading: Good College for the PGDM Course.
reviews.review_text: Thakur Global Business School offers a dynamic learning experience. Modern facilities, like well-equipped classrooms and a vast library filled with resources, create a stimulating atmosphere for knowledge acquisition. The campus is well-maintained and aesthetically pleasing, with a green campus.

reviews.review_heading: Good College for the PGDM Course.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure at TGBS is top-notch, providing students with a good environment for learning and personal development. The campus is well-maintained and aesthetically pleasing, with a lush green campus. The campus and classrooms are spacious and well-maintained.

reviews.review_heading: One of the best colleges if a student is looking for a PGDM course.
reviews.review_text: Our college is well-equipped with all the necessary tools and facilities that a college would require to impart knowledge. Our college is fully air-conditioned; it has a computer lab, a physical library, as well as a digital library. Every class has a projector, computer, and audio system. Our college has a recreation lab and a mindful lab.

reviews.review_heading: The best college for PGDM in the western suburbs.
reviews.review_text: State-of-the-art infrastructure that is well developed with evident facilities that are provided by our institute. We have indoor and outdoor sports on the hill, and we have the best I.T. labs, a library, and good canteen foods that are provided on campus, which is good.

reviews.review_heading: Good College for PG Management.
reviews.review_text: Our college is well-equipped with all the necessary tools and facilities that a management school requires to impart knowledge. Fully air-conditioned, Wi-fi is available throughout the campus. Both physical libraries as well as digital libraries are available. Every classroom is equipped with a projector. The college has a recreation center and a consciousness lab to help with spiritual well-being.

reviews.review_heading: The Best College for PG Management.
reviews.review_text: Well-equipped with all the necessary tools and facilities that a college would require to impart knowledge. Fully air-conditioned, the IT Lab has a physical library with a huge collection of books as well as a digital library. Every classroom is equipped with projectors, speakers, and computers required to impart knowledge. The college also has a consciousness lab and separate common rooms for girls and boys.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied college.
reviews.review_text: We also have indoor and outdoor sports facilities for students to relax. It also helps us with real-world case studies. Here, classrooms are air-conditioned with Wi-Fi connectivity and modern equipment. Also, there is a cafeteria and a medical center.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the quality of education, infrastructure and placements.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure in our college in commendable, providing students with modern facilities conducive ro learning and growth. The campus boasts well-equipped classrooms, extensive library, AC classrooms, Wi-Fi connectivity, discussion room, sports etc.

reviews.review_heading: It is an excellent college, as we not only get book knowledge but also practical experience.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus. Our classrooms are good. A library is available. Our college provides good infrastructure. The quality of food in the canteen is good. Medical facilities are available.

reviews.review_heading: It is a very good college to study in.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is very good with organised environment. It provides reliable Wi-Fi, clean hostels, exceptional food, comprehensive medical facilities, and an emphasis on sports. It is a student-centric college fostering very well for the welfare of the students.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides a supportive community to create a holistic learning environment.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides good facilities. The infrastructure is excellent. Our campus is Wi-Fi enabled. Laboratories are well equipped. Classrooms are well-maintained. There is a decent library in this college. The food served in the canteen is decent. Medical services are available. Sports are conducted. This institution provides a conducive learning environment ensuring holistic well being.

reviews.review_heading: Go for it, it's worth it!
reviews.review_text: Our college is well-equipped with all necessary tools and facilities that a college would require to impart knowledge. Our college is fully air conditioned, it has a computer lab, it has a physical library as well as a digital library portals. Every classroom is equipped with projector, computer anjd audio system. Our college also has a recreation center and mindfulness lab.

reviews.review_heading: One of the best colleges if a student is looking for PGDM.
reviews.review_text: Well-equipped classrooms with comfortable seating arrangements, Wi-Fi present throughout the campus which helps students to avail the online access, extensive collections of books, research papers, journals, articles etc. The taste and varieties of food are offered in the canteen keeping into consideration about the cleanliness.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is good in all aspects.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is good. Our college provides us with all facilities. Our college has smart classrooms, computer labs, a seminar hall, a playing area, a library, etc. Medical facilities are available in our college. The canteen is hygienic. Our college has good environment.

review_summary.college_name: SNS College of Engineering, SNS Group of Institutions Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: A friendly college with good facilities, placements, and a calm environment for learning and growth.

content.Placements: About 75 percent of students got placed. The highest package is about 12 LPA, the average package is about 8 LPA, and the lowest package is about 3 LPA. Google, Microsoft, and Infosys are the top recruiting companies. 80 percent of students got internships like Intrainz, ACMegrade, and LeRemitt. Software developer and full-stack developer are the top roles offered.
content.Infrastructure: We've provided the learning studio, which has an excellent ambience with a smartboard in the classroom. It is neat, clean, and enthusiastic. The labs are provided with air-conditioners and well-modified. The hostel is also excellent, the rooms are spacious, neat, and clean, and the food they provide is also tasty and hygienic.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Mechatronics and Mechanical Engineering in Additive Manufacturing - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Satisfied with staff and placement. The education quality is good. The infrastructure is okay.

content.Placements: The placements are good in this college. Mostly, 90 percent of the students get placed every year. There are placement coordinators assigned for each department from the 2nd year, and training is given for placement from the 2nd year. So, most of the students get placed here.
content.Infrastructure: The course is very good, and the college infrastructure is good. The classrooms, labs, library, and activity center are all good and seem amazing with vibrant colors. The hostel infrastructure is very bad, and the hostel food is very bad; it cannot be borne for even 1 day. The course and staff are very amazing and knowledgeable, up-to-date.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Great faculty, good placements!

content.Placements: 80 percent students were placed. The highest package: 12 LPA, lowest: 3 LPA, average: 6 LPA. Top recruiters: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Zoho. 60 percent got internships at firms like HCL, L&T and Cognizant. Top roles: Software Developer, Analyst, and Data Engineer.
content.Infrastructure: The course has excellent Wi-Fi, well-equipped labs, smart classrooms and vast library with ample resources. Hostels provide comfortable rooms with basic amenities. Mess and canteen serve decent food. Medical facilities are available. Sports facilities include courts and gyms.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: The college has the best environment. It is the best college to join.

content.Placements: Placements are not on a very high level because some companies only just come and visit our campus. They do not hire students except Accenture. Only IT companies came for interviews. Our college does not provide any kind of companies. For students who want to focus on placements, I would not recommend joining this college.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good. Our college is very beautiful and pleasant. Other facilities are good for students. If you join this college, you can enjoy life. It provides other kinds of things, so if you are in Coimbatore, it is the best college for students to join.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: I'm not suggesting to take admission in this college.

content.Placements: In our institution, placement is below average and in my department, 18/50 are placed in core and IT companies. The highest package is 9.5 LPA and the lowest package was 2.0 LPA. Only one company have visited our campus; that company was Accenture. So many of students are not placed in my department.
content.Infrastructure: Hostel foods are of the worst in quality and no one can eat them happily. The labs in our college are average but the library is good for improving our knowledge. But they give more preference to sports and cultural events. The one main thing is SNS Spine but they didn't allow to utilize the spine.

reviews.review_heading: SNS College of Engineering is overall a good college.
reviews.review_text: SNS College of Engineering has a good infrastructure. This college’s environment is good. More mechanical laboratory facilities are provided by the college. reviews.review_heading: Review of SNS College of Engineering, SNS Group of Institutions.
reviews.review_text:
College:
Wi-Fi available Jio 1 GB/day.
Different computer labs with air conditioning.
Classrooms are small with fans and have simple projectors for presentations.

Hostel:
Quality of food is average, not good. Different food daily, some items are repeated in the menu. Medical facility is okay. Non-veg served monthly once. Sports are your interest, and your wish to join it will add credit points on NAC.

reviews.review_heading: SNS College of Engineering.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is available of Jio daily. Different computer labs and machines are available here. Classrooms have Wi-Fi. Library has all kind of books. In hostel, food is the worst. The college is better in sports. Medical facilities are worth it.

reviews.review_heading: The college which takes your life's responsibility.
reviews.review_text: In my CSE department, the classrooms are fully equipped with Wi-Fi and projectors. The labs are well-maintained and of good quality. The library is medium-sized but has a lot of books for all courses. The hostel infrastructure is average; it's okay for someone who can adjust with three roommates and a common bathroom. However, the hostel food is very average; they serve chicken only once a month.

reviews.review_heading: Impressive design thinking concept and campus life.
reviews.review_text:
The college hostel is provided for both boys and girls with high maintenance and security. Better rooms and food are available. The hostel offers three different packages. 24/7 medical assistance is provided.
It is recommended to stay due to long-distance students. It feels like home.

reviews.review_heading: It is an excellent college.
reviews.review_text: Our college has excellent infrastructure. A food court is available. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus. We have a library, a design thinking spine, a CAD lab, an artificial data science lab, a cafe, and an auditorium. The food is more affordable. The college has a good study environment. Our classrooms are spacious. The hostel room can accommodate four students.

reviews.review_heading: To get a placement in a reputed organization.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is good when compared with other colleges in Coimbatore. The entrance to the campus is beautiful with the lawn and grass with maintenance. The campus is kept polite and discipline is kept by the students because it is necessary to study in this college.

reviews.review_heading: I am not satisfied with this college because of its faculty members.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college and hostel is good. The food served in the hostel is not much good. The lab facilities are good. The cafeteria is good. Our college doesn't provide medical facilities. When someone got injured, they send to the nearest hospital.

The Administrative Management College provides an MBA with an annual intake of 180 students, with a course fee structure that includes tuition fees ranging from INR 1.2 lakh - INR 5.1 lakh. overview_faqs.question: Is it worth doing MBA from AMC Bangalore?
overview_faqs.answer: Administrative Management College Bangalore is ranked the 25th best private college for placements all over India. The placements of the MBA batch at AMC Bangalore are doing really well and it is definitely worth doing an MBA from AMC Bangalore. Candidates seeking admission to the course can apply by registering on the official website and following the admission process.

review_summary.college_name: Administrative Management College Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.) - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: Students are always high. If students have no goals, then it is recommended. It has a huge campus.

content.Placements: There are no placements at all, and everything is fake. In the name of placements, they will conduct interviews for namesake, and the options we had are underpaid teachers or a sales agent. Even companies wouldn't want to recruit from here. If students want a degree for framing, then go for it. Once we pass out, they will ask us for our offer letter for the job we get on our own, and post it as a campus placement.
content.Infrastructure: It has broken benches and chairs. Boards are from ancient Indian times. It has broken fans and lights, nothing is functional. There is no Wi-Fi. Classrooms are very small, and we might suffocate as fans do not work either, and windows are broken. Washrooms are like a public shauchalay. The canteen is in a different state entirely (very far) and not worth it. The campus life does not exist.

individual_reviews.course: B.Sc. in Biotechnology - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Administrative Management College is not something I expected but it is something we can choose.

content.Placements: Actually, according to college information, students are placed from different companies, but we will get to know once we are placed or our upcoming pass out students get placed. Our college is already providing placement classes for all the students, including 1st-year students.
content.Infrastructure: We actually have different labs for different subjects, but I'll tell you honestly, they are extremely average. The view from the outside isn't the same inside; this is an honest opinion, no exaggeration. But when it comes to sports, the canteen, medical facilities, and so on, I would rate it a 4. Since everything has to be included completely, it's a 3.

content.Infrastructure: We get all the facilities like labs, library, canteen, separate classrooms, seminar hall, and one classroom for the projector. The place is hygienic and beautiful. You can just sit on the grass and do your work if you don't feel like going to the library. There are so many trees and greenery around.

individual_reviews.title: It is one of the best colleges for management and engineering.

content.Placements: Placements are good in our college. The highest salary package offered for BCA the previous year was 18 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Our campus is good and huge. Canteen is good and spacious. Food is not served on Saturday evening so students should have their dinner outside. It is a ragging-free campus.

content.Other: Many events are organised in our college. It is growing much faster than other colleges. Campus crowd includes some students from Nepal.

admission_overview.college_name: Administrative Management College Course Admissions 2025: Fees, Eligibility, Application Process

paragraphs: All the courses of AMC are offered in affiliation withBangalore University. Admission to these courses is entrance-based. Those who want to take admission to MBA must have qualified for either one of the entrance exams from MAT/CAT/ CMAT/GMAT/ XAT/ ATMA. Aspirants can visit the official website ofAMC Management Collegeand fill an online application for admission to the course of their choice. The courses are offered in a full time mode and candidates are shortlisted based on their performance in the entrance test. There are various UG and PG courses on offer for candidates to choose from such as MBA, BCom, MSc, and MCA.

AMC Bangalore applications are ongoing. Candidates can register on the official website of the university for their preferred course. The group of institutions offers more than 20 courses in various specialisations. The group of institutions offers courses in Engineering, Management, Science, and other streams. Check below the key highlights forAMC Bangalore Coursesadmission 2025:
Particulars
AMC Bangalore Admission Highlights 2025
Mode of study
Regular/ Full-Time
Programmes Offered
20+ courses across multiple specialisations
How to apply?
https://amcgroup.edu.in/contact
Level of programmes offered
Undergraduate and Postgraduate
Popular programmes
MBA | BBA| BCom
NOTE:The information available in the above table is sourced from various sources on the internet. Hence, is indicative.

AMC, Bangalore offers more than 20 undergraduate and postgraduate level courses to students across Management, Science, and Commerce streams.AMC Bangalore course admission 2025to all courses is subject to an entrance test. The minimum qualification required for UG courses is Class 12 whereas graduation is required for PG programmes. Check out all the popular AMC Bangalore courses along with their selection criteria and eligibility in the table below:
UG degree with a minimum of 50% aggregate
Class 12 with a minimum of 40% aggregate
Class 12 with a minimum of 40% aggregate
Eligibility:UG degree with 50% aggregate in the respective subjects
Selection Criteria:Merit-based
*The total fee is sourced from unofficial sources. Hence, is indicative.

As per the details of admission on the official website of AMC Bangalore, the admission process can either be merit-based or entrance-based, depending upon the course. Candidates might be required to appear for entrance exams.AMC Bangalore admission processis a multi-step process that includes steps of application, appearance in the selection rounds, offline admission process, and document verification. A step-by-step process that students need to follow is as follows:
STEP 1: AMC Bangalore Application Process 2025

The application process for all programmes at AMC are ongoing for the admission session 2025. Candidates can fill out theAMC Bangalore application form 2025on the official website. The admission registration fee isINR 2,000for all programmes.
STEP 2: AMC Bangalore Selection Rounds 2025

Candidates who've applied for any course at AMC Bangalore are required to fill out the application form and appear for the entrance exam that is mentioned in the selection process of the course. Candidates who clear the entrance or are shortlisted based on their merit must participate in the further round of admission.
STEP 3: AMC Bangalore Shortlist Release and Final Offer

The results of the selection process are made available once the admission process has concluded. Additionally, selected candidates receive an offer via email. Candidates must accept the offer by paying the course fee and guaranteeing their admission.
STEP 4: AMC Bangalore Document Verification & Payment of Admission Fee

Candidates must appear for the document verification process that is conducted by AMC Bangalore to make the admission process smoother. However, the fee payment must be done online through the mentioned fee payment methods. They're required to pay theAMC University feefor the first year. Candidates can check the in-depth fee structure of all the courses on the official website of the Administrative Management College.

The institute offers B.Sc. in Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Statistics, and Biotechnology, among other specialisations. Candidates must fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria which is :- 45% in XII (for general category students) to apply for B.Sc. courses at Administrative Management College. The institute considers Karnataka 2nd PUC scores of the aspirants for admission to the B.Sc.

faqs.question: Is it worth doing MBA from AMC Bangalore?
faqs.answer: Administrative Management College Bangalore is ranked the 25th best private college for placements all over India. The placements of the MBA batch at AMC Bangalore are doing really well and it is definitely worth doing an MBA from AMC Bangalore. Candidates seeking admission to the course can apply by registering on the official website and following the admission process.

placement_data.title: Administrative Management College Placement Overview 2024
paragraphs: The placement drive for season 2024 at Administrative Management College (AMC) has concluded and the highest package stood at INR 30 LPA. The median package offered to the graduating batch of Administrative Management College placement is INR 5.5 LPA in 2024 placements. Further, a placement rate of 95% is recorded during the placements 2024 at AMC. Top recruiters include- JP Morgan, Samsung, IBM, Accenture, Cognizant , etc made into the list at Administrative Management College placements.

The placement and training cell at Administrative Management College is equipped to train students for improving their overall personality development. Students are provided with training to enhance analytical skills, problem solving ability, critical thinking, time management and organizational skills. In collaboration with various top companies, the cell offers industrial training to students to gain insights into the professional world once they graduate.
