cut_off.college_name: Administrative Management College Cutoff 2025: Check Karnataka PGCET Round Wise Cutoff Ranks

description: Administrative Management College cutoff 2025 is available on this page for admission to several UG & PG courses. Candidates can refer to the exam-wise sections below to view the course, exam, round and category-wise cutoff details. Further exam-related updates are below:

Administrative Management College Karnataka PGCET cutoff 2025 was concluded with the release of the final cutoff list. For admission to the MBA/PGDM course, the last round cutoff rank was 30690 in the General AI category.

Karnataka PGCET is the accepting exam for MBA/PGDM admission at Administrative Management College. In 2025, the last round cutoff for MBA/PGDM admission was 30690 in the General category under the AI quota. In 2024, the cutoff rank for the same course was 35992, while in 2023, it was 31059.
For more categories, rounds, and quotas, candidates can use the provided filters to view the cutoffs.
Candidates preparing for 2026 admission can refer to the table below to view some of the important dates related to Karnataka PGCET 2026.

Administrative Management College accepts Karnataka PGCET entrance exam scores for admission to the MBA/PGDM courses. Candidates can refer to the table below to check out the consolidated year-wise Karnataka PGCET cutoff lists.

highlights.description: Administrative Management College has been continuously recognised as one of the leading institutes by numerous national ranking agencies. The institute is ranked #25 in the BBA category, and #17 under Hotel Management (Private) by the Outlook-ICARE 2025. The academic reputation, dedicated faculty, and well-laid infrastructure are some of the reasons of the institute's high ranks among numerous ranking agencies. The article below covers all the information around Administrative Management College rankings:

rankings.highlight: 8th Best Among Outlook Ranked Colleges In Bangalore In 2024
2nd Best Among Outlook Ranked Colleges In Bangalore In 2025
3rd Best Among Outlook Ranked Colleges In Bangalore In 2024

outlook.description:
Administrative Management College has earned commendable rankings across different domains in the Outlook-ICARE 2025. This signifies the institution's esteemed reputation and proficiency in various aspects, assigning it an overall good score. Administrative Management College's rankings in 'BBA' category have exhibited stability in trend as per the rankings of the previous years. In 2025, Administrative Management College's rank is #25, the same as last year's rank in the 'BBA' category by the Outlook-ICARE ranking.
The rankings of the institute in the 'Hotel Management (Private)' category have displayed a decreasing trend when evaluated against previous year's rankings. In 2025, Administrative Management College fell 2 ranks to #17 rank in the 'Hotel Management (Private)' category by the Outlook-ICARE ranking.

hostel_campus.college_name: Administrative Management College Infrastructure Details & Reviews

hostel.description:
There are well-furnished separate hostels for boys and girls.
Hostel provides facilities such as Food is Prepared with the Highest Standards of Health & Hygienewith Organic Fruits & Veggies Grown on Campus, Well Maintained Spacious Dining Halls, Sickroom Facilities & Ambulance on Campus, Modern Gym with an Expert Trainer, Recreational Room for Yoga, Tv and Audio Room, Sports Complex (Indoor & Outdoor Sports), Periodic Adventure Tours, Special Rooms for Short-stay of Parents, 24x7 Security, Power & High Speed Wifi, Weekly Laundry Services
facilities: Teachers guide you when you work on research or big projects.
You can use campus resources (like books, internet, case studies) for your work.

library.description: Central library with a collection of over 50,000 volumes, 12,000 titles of text and reference books, 100+ National and 300+ International subscribed journals. The library also has 3,000 CD’s and 1200 Project reports which are a collection of research and other professional activities of potential users.

sports.description: Available Facilities: Badminton Court, Basketball Court, Cricket Ground, Football Ground, Table Tennis, Volleyball Court, Handball Court, Throw Ball Court, Hockey Field

cafeteria.description: There are two major canteens which offer multi-cuisine food for both resident students and day scholars. A leading café chain has set up its operations on campus offers snacks, coffee, sandwich and pastries.

labs.description: Available Facilities: Computer Lab, Designated Labs

reviews.review_heading: Students are always high. If students have no goals, then it is recommended. It has a huge campus.
reviews.review_text: It has broken benches and chairs. Boards are from ancient Indian times. It has broken fans and lights, nothing is functional. There is no Wi-Fi. Classrooms are very small, and we might suffocate as fans do not work either, and windows are broken. Washrooms are like a public shauchalay. The canteen is in a different state entirely (very far) and not worth it. The campus life does not exist.

reviews.review_heading: Administrative Management College is not something I expected but it is something we can choose.
reviews.review_text: We actually have different labs for different subjects, but I'll tell you honestly, they are extremely average. The view from the outside isn't the same inside; this is an honest opinion, no exaggeration. But when it comes to sports, the canteen, medical facilities, and so on, I would rate it a 4. Since everything has to be included completely, it's a 3.

reviews.review_heading: Review on Administrative Management College.
reviews.review_text: We get all the facilities like labs, library, canteen, separate classrooms, seminar hall, and one classroom for the projector. The place is hygienic and beautiful. You can just sit on the grass and do your work if you don't feel like going to the library. There are so many trees and greenery around.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure of College .
reviews.review_text: . AMC College of classrooms quality also 24 hours of CCV Camera are available, and high levels of Wi-Fi, library and labs about library books all related BCA Books are available. College hostel fee it's god about facility of food timely provide and inside GYM facilities are their. Quality foods and sports period and games Equipments.

reviews.review_heading: It is one of the best colleges for management and engineering.
reviews.review_text: Our campus is good and huge. Canteen is good and spacious. Food is not served on Saturday evening so students should have their dinner outside. It is a ragging-free campus.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with its faculty members, but provides an average placements service.
reviews.review_text: There were separate hostels for girls and boys. The college had a huge canteen which servers both north and south dishes. There were no Wi-Fi facilities on the campus. Classrooms were normal and had projector facilities in most of the classes.

reviews.review_heading: A good college but needs to improve placements and provide more opportunities in other activities.
reviews.review_text: The college has good classrooms. One can easily get books from the library. There is no Wi-Fi in college, and mainly the college has network jammers, so we can not get a network. The business lab is available only for namesake, and it is dirty all around. They open the business lab yearly once and do nothing.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied with faculty. Good placement good infrastructure .
reviews.review_text:
Wi-Fi, labs, smart classrooms and library are there. 
All the hostel facilities are good as compared to all other colleges. Food is prepared in hygienic places and is served with best possible way, medical facilities are also available within the campus and also in hostel premises. There is a wide sports room providing all the required equipment for sports and games.

reviews.review_heading: It's a good college for studies.
reviews.review_text: Everything is good. Infrastructure is very good. Teachers are very supportive and every department is having the best faculty members. In hostel Wi-Fi is 24/7 available with good speed and food is good to consume. Medical facilities is up to date.

reviews.review_heading: It is one of the best colleges for management studies.
reviews.review_text: Although Wi-Fi is not available for the whole college but is available for the hostel. Library, laboratories, and classrooms are good. The facilities are above average. The canteen, medical & sports facilities are also good and above average.

reviews.review_heading: Unbiased review on AMC College of Hotel Management.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is very good. Classes are sanitized regularly. Covid protocols are followed everyday. Social distancing is maintained in classes. Canteen is a bit far away. The food is average, not much can be expected from outsourced canteens. Parking is plenty for both bikes and cars.

reviews.review_heading: Infrastructure and placements are good.
reviews.review_text: Our institution has 28 rooms in the training hotel for on the job, off the job and part-time. Our college has digital classrooms, a restaurant, quantity kitchen, lobby room and library. The quality of the food in the hostel is excellent, and it is in the process of cycling the menu. There is also hostel accommodation, computer lab, electronic lab, microprocessor lab, central library, cafeteria, sports complex, gym in the hostel, Wi-Fi on the campus and campus bank facility.

reviews.review_heading: The faculty team of AMC-HM makes it a gem, and the college has a training hotel (AMC Comforts).
reviews.review_text: Administrative Management College provides a well maintained and managed library, where we can study in a peaceful environment. They also provide a well-equipped kitchen, restaurant, and other facilities for practicals. The classrooms are well lit and very neat and tidy. AMC also provides hostel facilities with a spacious mess and mouth-watering food. We conduct AMC games week, where we compete with different departments of the college.

reviews.review_heading: It is one of the finest colleges for hotel management bachelors in Bangalore and around.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides good infrastructure for the class as well as practicals. There is a wide variety of kitchen equipment in production and a good amount of IT facilities. The class ambience is also good. COVID adaptions and online classes are conducted well now.

reviews.review_heading: It is an average college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is not that good. Only some classes are having a fan most of the classes don't have proper lighting even. There is a good library though which is not used that frequently. There is no canteen in our college, but they're one of the engineering college of AMC.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 28 published reviews , 22 reviews are verified.
